270  protected internal override MyCubeGrid CurrentGrid
271  {
272  get { return m_currentGrid; }
273  protected set
274  {
275  if (FreezeGizmo)
276  return;
277 
278  if (m_currentGrid != value)
279  {
280  BeforeCurrentGridChange(value);
281  m_currentGrid = value;
282  m_customRotation = false;
283 
284  //Change block size if diferent size grid selected
285  if (IsCubeSizeModesAvailable && CurrentBlockDefinition != null && m_currentGrid != null)
286  {
287  var blockDefGroup = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetDefinitionGroup(CurrentBlockDefinition.BlockPairName);
288  int currDefinitionIndex = m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.IndexOf(CurrentBlockDefinition);
289  MyCubeSize newCubeSize = m_currentGrid.GridSizeEnum;
290  if (newCubeSize != CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize)
291  {
292  if ((newCubeSize == MyCubeSize.Small && blockDefGroup.Small != null) || (newCubeSize == MyCubeSize.Large && blockDefGroup.Large != null))
293  {
294  m_cubeBuildlerState.SetCubeSize(newCubeSize);
295  SetSurvivalIntersectionDist();
296  if (currDefinitionIndex != -1 && m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.Count > 0)
297  {
298  UpdateCubeBlockStageDefinition(m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages[currDefinitionIndex]);
299  }
300  }
301  }
302  }
303 
304  if (m_currentGrid == null)
305  {
306  RemoveSymmetryNotification();
307 
308  m_gizmo.Clear();
309  }
310  }
311  }
312  }

526  protected virtual void RotateAxis(int index, int sign, float angleDelta, bool newlyPressed)
527  {
528  if (DynamicMode)
529  {
530  MatrixD currentMatrix = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd;
531  MatrixD rotatedMatrix;
532 
533  if (!CalculateBlockRotation(index, sign, ref currentMatrix, out rotatedMatrix, angleDelta, MyBlockDirection.Both, MyBlockRotation.Both))
534  return;
535 
536  m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd = rotatedMatrix;
537  }
538  else
539  {
540  // Rotate gizmos only on a key press
541  if (!newlyPressed)
542  return;
543 
544  angleDelta = (float)Math.PI / 2;
545  MatrixD currentMatrix = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd;
546  MatrixD rotatedMatrix;
547 
548  if (!CalculateBlockRotation(index, sign, ref currentMatrix, out rotatedMatrix, angleDelta, CurrentBlockDefinition != null ? CurrentBlockDefinition.Direction : MyBlockDirection.Both,
549  CurrentBlockDefinition != null ? CurrentBlockDefinition.Rotation : MyBlockRotation.Both))
550  return;
551 
552  if (m_gizmo.RotationOptions != MyRotationOptionsEnum.None)
553  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudRotateBlock);
554 
555  m_gizmo.RotateAxis(ref rotatedMatrix);
556  }
557  }
558 
559  public static bool CalculateBlockRotation(int index, int sign, ref MatrixD currentMatrix, out MatrixD rotatedMatrix, float angle,
560  MyBlockDirection blockDirection = MyBlockDirection.Both, MyBlockRotation blockRotation = MyBlockRotation.Both)
561  {
562  Matrix rotation = Matrix.Identity;
563 
564  //because Z axis is negative
565  if (index == 2)
566  sign *= -1;
567 
568  Vector3D tmpRotationAnimation = Vector3D.Zero;
569 
570  switch (index)
571  {
572  case 0: //X
573  tmpRotationAnimation.X += sign * angle;
574  rotation = Matrix.CreateFromAxisAngle(currentMatrix.Right, sign * angle);
575  break;
576 
577  case 1: //Y
578  tmpRotationAnimation.Y += sign * angle;
579  rotation = Matrix.CreateFromAxisAngle(currentMatrix.Up, sign * angle);
580  break;
581 
582  case 2: //Z
583  tmpRotationAnimation.Z += sign * angle;
584  rotation = Matrix.CreateFromAxisAngle(currentMatrix.Forward, sign * angle);
585  break;
586 
587  default:
588  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(false);
589  break;
590  }
591 
592  rotatedMatrix = currentMatrix;
593  rotatedMatrix *= rotation;
594 
595  bool isValid = CheckValidBlockRotation(rotatedMatrix, blockDirection, blockRotation);
596  if (isValid && MySandboxGame.Config.AnimatedRotation)
597  if (!Static.DynamicMode)
598  if (!Static.m_animationLock)
599  Static.m_animationLock = true;
600  else
601  isValid = !isValid;
602 
603  return isValid;
604  }
605 
606  private void ActivateBlockCreation(MyDefinitionId? blockDefinitionId = null)
607  {
608  if (MySession.Static.CameraController == null || !MySession.Static.CameraController.AllowCubeBuilding)
609  {
610  // return;
611  }
612 
613  if (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity is MyShipController && (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity as MyShipController).BuildingMode == false)
614  return;
615 
616  //Change block size if same block selected
617  if (IsCubeSizeModesAvailable && blockDefinitionId.HasValue && CurrentBlockDefinition != null)
618  {
619  var tmpDef = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(blockDefinitionId.Value);
620  var blockDefGroup = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetDefinitionGroup(tmpDef.BlockPairName);
621  if ((CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize == MyCubeSize.Large && blockDefGroup.Small != null) || (CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize == MyCubeSize.Small && blockDefGroup.Large != null))
622  {
623  int currDefinitionIndex = m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.IndexOf(CurrentBlockDefinition);
624  MyCubeSize newCubeSize = m_cubeBuildlerState.CubeSizeMode == MyCubeSize.Large ? MyCubeSize.Small : MyCubeSize.Large;
625  m_cubeBuildlerState.SetCubeSize(newCubeSize);
626  SetSurvivalIntersectionDist();
627  if (currDefinitionIndex != -1 && m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.Count > 0)
628  {
629  UpdateCubeBlockStageDefinition(m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages[currDefinitionIndex]);
630  }
631  }
632  else
633  {
634  UpdateNotificationBlockNotAvailable();
635  }
636  }
637  else if (CurrentBlockDefinition == null && blockDefinitionId.HasValue)
638  {
639  var tmpDef = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(blockDefinitionId.Value);
640  var newCubeSize = m_cubeBuildlerState.CubeSizeMode;
641  if (tmpDef.CubeSize != newCubeSize)
642  {
643  var otherblock = tmpDef.CubeSize == MyCubeSize.Large ? MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetDefinitionGroup(tmpDef.BlockPairName).Small : MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetDefinitionGroup(tmpDef.BlockPairName).Large;
644  if (otherblock == null)
645  {
646  newCubeSize = tmpDef.CubeSize;
647  }
648  }
649  m_cubeBuildlerState.SetCubeSize(newCubeSize);
650  }
651 
652 
653  UpdateCubeBlockDefinition(blockDefinitionId);
654 
655  SetSurvivalIntersectionDist();
656 
657  if (MySession.Static.CreativeMode)
658  {
659  AllowFreeSpacePlacement = false;
660  MaxGridDistanceFrom = null;
661  ShowRemoveGizmo = MyFakes.SHOW_REMOVE_GIZMO;
662  }
663  else
664  {
665  AllowFreeSpacePlacement = false;
666  ShowRemoveGizmo = true;
667  }
668 
669  ActivateNotifications();
670 
671  if (!(MySession.Static.ControlledEntity is MyShipController) || (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity as MyShipController).BuildingMode == false) MyHud.Crosshair.ResetToDefault();
672 
673  // MyCubeBuilder.Static.UpdateNotificationBlockNotAvailable();
674 
675  BlockCreationIsActivated = true;
676 
677  this.AlignToGravity();
678 
679  }
680 
681  public void DeactivateBlockCreation()
682  {
683  if (m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinition != null)
684  {
685  m_cubeBuildlerState.UpdateCubeBlockDefinition(m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinition.Id, m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd);
686  }
687 
688  BlockCreationIsActivated = false;
689  DeactivateNotifications();
690  //MyCubeBuilder.Static.UpdateNotificationBlockNotAvailable();
691  }
692 
693  private void ActivateNotifications()
694  {
695  if (MyInput.Static.IsJoystickConnected() && MyFakes.ENABLE_CONTROLLER_HINTS)
696  {
697  if (!IsBuildMode)
698  MyHud.Notifications.Add(m_buildModeHint);
699  if (MySession.Static.CreativeMode)
700  MyHud.Notifications.Add(JoystickUnlimitedBuildingHint);
701  else
702  MyHud.Notifications.Add(JoystickBuildingHint);
703  }
704  else
705  {
706  if (MySession.Static.CreativeMode)
707  MyHud.Notifications.Add(UnlimitedBuildingHint);
708  else
709  MyHud.Notifications.Add(BuildingHint);
710 
711  ActivateBuildModeNotifications(false);
712  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_BLOCK_COLORING)
713  MyHud.Notifications.Add(ColorHint);
714  }
715  }
716 
717  private void DeactivateNotifications()
718  {
719  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(m_buildModeHint);
720  if (MySession.Static.CreativeMode)
721  {
722  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(UnlimitedBuildingHint);
723  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(JoystickUnlimitedBuildingHint);
724  }
725  else
726  {
727  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(BuildingHint);
728  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(JoystickBuildingHint);
729  }
730 
731  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_BLOCK_COLORING)
732  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(ColorHint);
733 
734  DeactivateBuildModeNotifications();
735  }

741  protected virtual bool IsDynamicOverride()
742  {
743  if (m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinition == null || CurrentGrid == null)
744  return false;
745 
746  return m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize == MyCubeSize.Small && CurrentGrid.GridSizeEnum == MyCubeSize.Large;
747  }
748 
749  private void ActivateBuildModeNotifications(bool joystick)
750  {
751  if (joystick)
752  {
753  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(m_buildModeHint);
754  MyHud.Notifications.Add(JoystickRotationHint);
755  MyHud.Notifications.Add(JoystickColorHint);
756  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS)
757  MyHud.Notifications.Add(JoystickCompoundModeHint);
758 
759  MyHud.Notifications.Add(JoystickDynamicModeHint);
760  }
761  else
762  {
763  MyHud.Notifications.Add(BlockRotationHint);
764  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS)
765  MyHud.Notifications.Add(CompoundModeHint);
766 
767  // MyHud.Notifications.Add(DynamicModeHint);
768  }
769  }
770 
771  private void DeactivateBuildModeNotifications()
772  {
773  if (MyInput.Static.IsJoystickConnected() && IsActivated)
774  MyHud.Notifications.Add(m_buildModeHint);
775 
776  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(BlockRotationHint);
777  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(JoystickRotationHint);
778  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(JoystickColorHint);
779 
780  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS)
781  {
782  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(CompoundModeHint);
783  MyHud.Notifications.Remove(JoystickCompoundModeHint);
784  }

791  private void InitializeNotifications()
792  {
793  // keyboard mouse notifications
794  {
795  var next = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.SWITCH_LEFT);
796  var prev = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.SWITCH_RIGHT);
797  var compoundToggle = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.SWITCH_COMPOUND);
798  // var buildingModeToggle = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.SWITCH_BUILDING_MODE);
799  var build = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.PRIMARY_TOOL_ACTION);
800  var rotxp = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_VERTICAL_POSITIVE);
801  var rotxn = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_VERTICAL_NEGATIVE);

803  var rotyn = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_HORISONTAL_NEGATIVE);
804  var rotzp = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_ROLL_POSITIVE);
805  var rotzn = MyInput.Static.GetGameControl(MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_ROLL_NEGATIVE);
806 
807  // This will combine controls which has name
808  var controlHelper = new MyHudNotifications.ControlsHelper(rotxp, rotxn, rotzp, rotzn, rotyp, rotyn);
809 
810  BlockRotationHint = MyHudNotifications.CreateControlNotification(MyCommonTexts.NotificationRotationFormatCombined, controlHelper);

812  BuildingHint = MyHudNotifications.CreateControlNotification(MyCommonTexts.NotificationBuildingFormat, build);
813  UnlimitedBuildingHint = MyHudNotifications.CreateControlNotification(MyCommonTexts.NotificationUnlimitedBuildingFormat, "LMB", "RMB", "CTRL");
814  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS)
815  CompoundModeHint = MyHudNotifications.CreateControlNotification(MyCommonTexts.NotificationCompoundBuildingFormat, compoundToggle, "ALT");
816 
817  // DynamicModeHint = MyHudNotifications.CreateControlNotification(MyCommonTexts.NotificationSwitchBuildingModeFormat, buildingModeToggle);
818  m_buildModeHint = null;
819  }
820 
821  // joystick notifications
822  {

824  var cx_build = MySpaceBindingCreator.CX_BUILD_MODE;

829  var rotateBlockCode2 = MyControllerHelper.GetCodeForControl(cx_build, MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_HORISONTAL_NEGATIVE);
830  var rotateBlockCode3 = MyControllerHelper.GetCodeForControl(cx_build, MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_VERTICAL_NEGATIVE);

833  var rotateBlockRollCode2 = MyControllerHelper.GetCodeForControl(cx_build, MyControlsSpace.CUBE_ROTATE_ROLL_NEGATIVE);

850 
851  JoystickDynamicModeHint = MyHudNotifications.CreateControlNotification(MyCommonTexts.NotificationSwitchBuildingModeFormat, dynamicModeCode);
852  m_buildModeHint = MyHudNotifications.CreateControlNotification(MyCommonTexts.NotificationHintPressToOpenBuildMode, buildModeCode);
853  }

893  protected virtual void UpdateCubeBlockStageDefinition(MyCubeBlockDefinition stageCubeBlockDefinition)
894  {
895  Debug.Assert(stageCubeBlockDefinition != null);
896 
897  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null && stageCubeBlockDefinition != null)
898  {
899  Quaternion rotation = Quaternion.CreateFromRotationMatrix(m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd);
900  m_cubeBuildlerState.RotationsByDefinitionHash[CurrentBlockDefinition.Id] = rotation;
901  }
902 
903  CurrentBlockDefinition = stageCubeBlockDefinition;
904 
905  m_gizmo.RotationOptions = MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetCubeRotationOptions(CurrentBlockDefinition);
906 
907  Quaternion lastRot;
908  if (m_cubeBuildlerState.RotationsByDefinitionHash.TryGetValue(stageCubeBlockDefinition.Id, out lastRot))
909  m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd = Matrix.CreateFromQuaternion(lastRot);
910  else
911  m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd = Matrix.Identity;
912  }
913 
914  protected virtual void UpdateCubeBlockDefinition(MyDefinitionId? id)
915  {
916 
917  m_cubeBuildlerState.UpdateCubeBlockDefinition(id, m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd);
918 
919  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null && IsCubeSizeModesAvailable)
920  m_cubeBuildlerState.UpdateComplementBlock();
921 
922  m_cubeBuildlerState.UpdateBlockDefinitionStages(id);
923 
924  if (m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinition == null)
925  return;
926 
927  m_gizmo.RotationOptions = MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetCubeRotationOptions(CurrentBlockDefinition);
928  Quaternion lastRot;
929 
930  MyDefinitionId defBlockId = id.HasValue ? id.Value : new MyDefinitionId();
931 
932  if (m_cubeBuildlerState.RotationsByDefinitionHash.TryGetValue(defBlockId, out lastRot))
933  m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd = Matrix.CreateFromQuaternion(lastRot);
934  else
935  m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd = Matrix.Identity;
936 
937  }

943  public void AddFastBuildModels(MatrixD baseMatrix, ref Matrix localMatrixAdd, List<MatrixD> matrices, List<string> models, MyCubeBlockDefinition definition,
944  Vector3I? startBuild, Vector3I? continueBuild)
945  {
946  AddFastBuildModelWithSubparts(ref baseMatrix, matrices, models, definition, CurrentBlockScale);
947 
948  // Can be CurrentBlockDefinition != definition?
949  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null && startBuild != null && continueBuild != null)
950  {
951  Vector3I rotatedSize;
952  Vector3I.TransformNormal(ref CurrentBlockDefinition.Size, ref localMatrixAdd, out rotatedSize);
953  rotatedSize = Vector3I.Abs(rotatedSize);
954 
955  Vector3I stepDelta;
956  Vector3I counter;
957  int stepCount;
958 
959  ComputeSteps(startBuild.Value, continueBuild.Value, rotatedSize, out stepDelta, out counter, out stepCount);
960 
961  Vector3I offset = Vector3I.Zero;
962  for (int i = 0; i < counter.X; i += 1, offset.X += stepDelta.X)
963  {
964  offset.Y = 0;
965  for (int j = 0; j < counter.Y; j += 1, offset.Y += stepDelta.Y)
966  {
967  offset.Z = 0;
968  for (int k = 0; k < counter.Z; k += 1, offset.Z += stepDelta.Z)
969  {
970  Vector3I pos = offset;
971  Vector3 offsetFloat;
972  if (CurrentGrid != null)
973  {
974  offsetFloat = Vector3.Transform(pos * CurrentGrid.GridSize, CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.GetOrientation());
975  }
976  else
977  {
978  float gridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize);
979  offsetFloat = pos * gridSize;
980  }
981 
982  var matrix = baseMatrix;
983  matrix.Translation += offsetFloat;
984 
985  AddFastBuildModelWithSubparts(ref matrix, matrices, models, definition, CurrentBlockScale);
986  }
987  }
988  }
989  }
990  }
991 
992  void AddFastBuildModels(MyCubeBuilderGizmo.MyGizmoSpaceProperties gizmoSpace, MatrixD baseMatrix, List<MatrixD> matrices, List<string> models, MyCubeBlockDefinition definition)
993  {
994  AddFastBuildModels(baseMatrix, ref gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd, matrices, models, definition, gizmoSpace.m_startBuild, gizmoSpace.m_continueBuild);
995  }

997  public void AlignToGravity(bool alignToCamera = true)
998  {
999 
1000  Vector3 gravity = MyGravityProviderSystem.CalculateNaturalGravityInPoint(IntersectionStart);
1001  if (gravity.LengthSquared() < Double.Epsilon && MyPerGameSettings.Game == GameEnum.ME_GAME)
1002  {
1003  gravity = Vector3.Down;
1004  }
1005 
1006  if (gravity.LengthSquared() > 0)
1007  {
1008  Matrix oldTransform = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd;
1009  gravity.Normalize();
1010 
1011  Vector3D newForward;
1012 
1013  if (MySector.MainCamera != null && alignToCamera)
1014  {
1015  newForward = Vector3D.Reject(MySector.MainCamera.ForwardVector, gravity);
1016  }
1017  else
1018  {
1019  newForward = Vector3D.Reject(m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd.Forward, gravity);
1020  }
1021 
1022  if (!newForward.IsValid() || newForward.LengthSquared() <= double.Epsilon)
1023  {
1024  newForward = Vector3D.CalculatePerpendicularVector(gravity);
1025  }
1026 
1027  newForward.Normalize();
1028  m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd = Matrix.CreateWorld(oldTransform.Translation, newForward, -gravity);
1029 
1030  }
1031 
1032  }

1034  public virtual bool HandleGameInput()
1035  {
1036  if (this.HandleExportInput())
1037  return true;
1038 
1039  if (MyInput.Static.IsNewGameControlPressed(MyControlsSpace.LANDING_GEAR) && MySession.Static.ControlledEntity == MySession.Static.LocalCharacter && MySession.Static.LocalHumanPlayer != null && MySession.Static.LocalHumanPlayer.Identity.Character == MySession.Static.ControlledEntity)
1040  {
1041  if (!MyInput.Static.IsAnyShiftKeyPressed() && MyGuiScreenGamePlay.ActiveGameplayScreen == null)
1042  {
1043  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudClick);
1044  MyGuiSandbox.AddScreen(MyGuiScreenGamePlay.ActiveGameplayScreen = new MyGuiScreenColorPicker());
1045  }
1046  }
1047 
1048  if (!IsActivated) // do not consume input when not active
1049  return false;
1050 
1051  int frameDt = MySandboxGame.TotalGamePlayTimeInMilliseconds - m_lastInputHandleTime;
1052  m_lastInputHandleTime += frameDt;
1053 
1054  bool disallowCockpitBuilding = MySession.Static.ControlledEntity is MyCockpit && !SpectatorIsBuilding;
1055  if (disallowCockpitBuilding && MySession.Static.ControlledEntity is MyCockpit && (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity as MyCockpit).BuildingMode) disallowCockpitBuilding = false;
1056 
1057  // Don't allow cube builder when paused or when in cockpit and not in developer spectator mode
1058  if (MySandboxGame.IsPaused || disallowCockpitBuilding)
1059  return false;
1060 
1061  if (MyInput.Static.IsNewLeftMousePressed() && MySession.Static.ControlledEntity is MyCockpit && (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity as MyCockpit).BuildingMode && MySession.Static.SurvivalMode)
1062  MySession.Static.LocalCharacter.BeginShoot(MyShootActionEnum.PrimaryAction);
1063 
1064  if (this.HandleDevInput())
1065  return true;
1066 
1067 
1068 
1069  var context = (IsActivated && MySession.Static.ControlledEntity is MyCharacter) ? MySession.Static.ControlledEntity.ControlContext : MyStringId.NullOrEmpty;
1070 
1071  if (IsActivated && MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, MyControlsSpace.BUILD_MODE))
1072  {
1073  IsBuildMode = !IsBuildMode;
1074  }
1075 
1076  if (MyInput.Static.IsNewGameControlPressed(MyControlsSpace.FREE_ROTATION)) //TODO: do something with it
1077  {
1078  this.AlignToGravity();
1079  }
1080 
1081  if (this.HandleAdminAndCreativeInput(context))
1082  return true;
1083 
1084  // Color Picker
1085  if (CurrentGrid != null && MyInput.Static.IsNewGameControlPressed(MyControlsSpace.LANDING_GEAR))
1086  {
1087  if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyShiftKeyPressed())
1088  {
1089  foreach (var gizmoSpace in m_gizmo.Spaces)
1090  {
1091  if (gizmoSpace.m_removeBlock != null && MySession.Static.LocalHumanPlayer != null)
1092  MySession.Static.LocalHumanPlayer.ChangeOrSwitchToColor(gizmoSpace.m_removeBlock.ColorMaskHSV);
1093  }
1094  }
1095  }
1096 
1097  if (CurrentGrid != null && MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, MyControlsSpace.CUBE_COLOR_CHANGE, MyControlStateType.PRESSED))
1098  {
1099  int expand = 0;
1100 
1101  //If Ctrl + Shift + Middle mouse button are pressed, recolor a huge area of blocks
1102  //THANK YOU PETR!
1103 
1104  if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyCtrlKeyPressed() && MyInput.Static.IsAnyShiftKeyPressed())
1105  {
1106  expand = -1;
1107  }
1108  else
1109  {
1110  // If only Ctrl + Middle mouse button are pressed, recolor a tiny block area
1111 
1112  if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyCtrlKeyPressed())
1113  expand = 1;
1114  else
1115  // If only Shift + Middle mouse button are pressed, recolor a medium block area
1116 
1117  if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyShiftKeyPressed())
1118  expand = 3;
1119  }
1120 
1121  Change(expand);
1122  }
1123 
1124  if (this.HandleRotationInput(context, frameDt))
1125  return true;
1126 
1127  var humanPlayer = MySession.Static.LocalHumanPlayer;
1128  if (MyInput.Static.IsNewGameControlPressed(MyControlsSpace.SWITCH_LEFT))
1129  {
1130  if (IsActivated && (CurrentBlockDefinition == null || MyFakes.ENABLE_BLOCK_COLORING) && humanPlayer != null)
1131  {
1132  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudClick);
1133  if (humanPlayer.SelectedBuildColorSlot - 1 < 0)
1134  humanPlayer.SelectedBuildColorSlot = humanPlayer.BuildColorSlots.Count-1;
1135  else
1136  humanPlayer.SelectedBuildColorSlot -= 1;
1137  }
1138  }
1139  if (MyInput.Static.IsNewGameControlPressed(MyControlsSpace.SWITCH_RIGHT))
1140  {
1141  if (IsActivated && (CurrentBlockDefinition == null || MyFakes.ENABLE_BLOCK_COLORING) && humanPlayer != null)
1142  {
1143  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudClick);
1144  if (humanPlayer.SelectedBuildColorSlot + 1 >= humanPlayer.BuildColorSlots.Count)
1145  humanPlayer.SelectedBuildColorSlot = 0;
1146  else
1147  humanPlayer.SelectedBuildColorSlot += 1;
1148  }
1149  }
1150 
1151  if (this.HandleBlockVariantsInput(context))
1152  return true;
1153 
1154  return false;
1155  }

1157  private bool HandleBlockVariantsInput(MyStringId context)
1158  {
1159  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_BLOCK_STAGES && CurrentBlockDefinition != null && m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.Count > 0)
1160  {
1161  bool? switchForward = null;
1162 
1163  int currentScrollWheelVal = MyInput.Static.MouseScrollWheelValue();
1164 
1165  if (!MyInput.Static.IsGameControlPressed(MyControlsSpace.LOOKAROUND) && !MyInput.Static.IsAnyCtrlKeyPressed() && !MyInput.Static.IsAnyShiftKeyPressed()
1166  && currentScrollWheelVal != 0)
1167  {
1168 
1169  if (MyInput.Static.PreviousMouseScrollWheelValue() < MyInput.Static.MouseScrollWheelValue()
1170  || MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, MyControlsSpace.NEXT_BLOCK_STAGE, MyControlStateType.NEW_PRESSED))
1171  {
1172  switchForward = true;
1173  }
1174  else if (MyInput.Static.PreviousMouseScrollWheelValue() > MyInput.Static.MouseScrollWheelValue()
1175  || MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, MyControlsSpace.PREV_BLOCK_STAGE, MyControlStateType.NEW_PRESSED))
1176  {
1177  switchForward = false;
1178  }
1179  }
1180 
1181  //if (switchForward == null && MyInput.Static.IsNewGameControlPressed(ME_SWITCH_STAGES))
1182  //{
1183  // switchForward = true;
1184  // if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyShiftKeyPressed())
1185  // switchForward = false;
1186  //}
1187 
1188  if (switchForward.HasValue)
1189  {
1190  int currDefinitionIndex = m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.IndexOf(CurrentBlockDefinition);
1191  int nextIndex;
1192 
1193  int increment = switchForward.Value ? 1 : -1;
1194  nextIndex = currDefinitionIndex;
1195  while ((nextIndex = nextIndex + increment) != currDefinitionIndex)
1196  {
1197  if (nextIndex >= m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.Count)
1198  nextIndex = 0;
1199  else if (nextIndex < 0)
1200  nextIndex = m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.Count - 1;
1201 
1202  if (!MySession.Static.SurvivalMode || (m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages[nextIndex].AvailableInSurvival && (MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_CONSTRUCTION || m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages[nextIndex].MultiBlock == null)))
1203  break;
1204  }
1205 
1206  UpdateCubeBlockStageDefinition(m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages[nextIndex]);
1207  }
1208  }
1209 
1210  //if (IsCubeSizeModesAvailable && MyInput.Static.IsGameControlReleased(MyControlsSpace.CUBE_BUILDER_CUBESIZE_MODE))
1211  //{
1212  // int currDefinitionIndex = m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.IndexOf(CurrentBlockDefinition);
1213  // MyCubeSize newCubeSize = m_cubeBuildlerState.CubeSizeMode == MyCubeSize.Large ? MyCubeSize.Small : MyCubeSize.Large;
1214  // m_cubeBuildlerState.SetCubeSize(newCubeSize);
1215  // SetSurvivalIntersectionDist();
1216  // if (currDefinitionIndex != -1 && m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages.Count > 0)
1217  // {
1218  // UpdateCubeBlockStageDefinition(m_cubeBuildlerState.CurrentBlockDefinitionStages[currDefinitionIndex]);
1219  // }
1220  // return true;
1221  //}
1222 
1223  return false;
1224  }

1229  private void SetSurvivalIntersectionDist()
1230  {
1231  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null)
1232  {
1233  if (MySession.Static.SurvivalMode && !SpectatorIsBuilding && MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId) == false)

1241  private bool HandleRotationInput(MyStringId context, int frameDt)
1242  {
1243  if (IsActivated)
1244  {
1245  if (MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, MyControlsSpace.CUBE_DEFAULT_MOUNTPOINT))
1246  m_alignToDefault = !m_alignToDefault;
1247 
1248  for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
1249  {
1250  bool standardRotation = MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, m_rotationControls[i], MyControlStateType.PRESSED);
1251  if (standardRotation)
1252  {
1253  if (m_alignToDefault)
1254  m_customRotation = true;
1255 
1256  bool newStandardPress = MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, m_rotationControls[i], MyControlStateType.NEW_PRESSED);
1257  bool newPress = newStandardPress;
1258 
1259  int axis = -1;
1260  int direction = m_rotationDirections[i];
1261 
1262  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_STANDARD_AXES_ROTATION)
1263  {
1264  axis = GetStandardRotationAxisAndDirection(i, ref direction);
1265  }
1266  else
1267  {
1268  if (i < 2)
1269  {
1270  axis = m_rotationHints.RotationUpAxis;
1271  direction *= m_rotationHints.RotationUpDirection;
1272  }
1273  if (i >= 2 && i < 4)
1274  {
1275  axis = m_rotationHints.RotationRightAxis;
1276  direction *= m_rotationHints.RotationRightDirection;
1277  }
1278  if (i >= 4)
1279  {
1280  axis = m_rotationHints.RotationForwardAxis;
1281  direction *= m_rotationHints.RotationForwardDirection;
1282  }
1283  }
1284 
1285  if (axis != -1)
1286  {
1287 
1288  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null && CurrentBlockDefinition.Rotation == MyBlockRotation.None)
1289  return false;
1290 
1291  float angleDelta = frameDt * BLOCK_ROTATION_SPEED;
1292 
1293  if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyCtrlKeyPressed())
1294  {
1295  if (!newPress)
1296  return false;
1297  angleDelta = MathHelper.PiOver2;
1298  }
1299  if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyAltKeyPressed())
1300  {
1301  if (!newPress)
1302  return false;
1303  angleDelta = MathHelper.ToRadians(1);
1304  }
1305 
1306  RotateAxis(axis, direction, angleDelta, newPress);
1307  }
1308  }
1309  }
1310  }
1311 
1312  return false;
1313  }

1341  private bool HandleExportInput()
1342  {
1343

1646  private bool HandleBlockCreationMovement(MyStringId context)
1647  {
1648  bool ctrl = MyInput.Static.IsAnyCtrlKeyPressed();
1649  if ((ctrl && MyInput.Static.PreviousMouseScrollWheelValue() < MyInput.Static.MouseScrollWheelValue())
1650  || MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, MyControlsSpace.MOVE_FURTHER, MyControlStateType.PRESSED))
1651  {
1652  float previousIntersectionDistance = IntersectionDistance;
1653  IntersectionDistance *= 1.1f;
1654  if (IntersectionDistance > CubeBuilderDefinition.MaxBlockBuildingDistance)
1655  IntersectionDistance = CubeBuilderDefinition.MaxBlockBuildingDistance;
1656 
1657  if (MySession.Static.SurvivalMode && !SpectatorIsBuilding)
1658  {
1659  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null)
1660  {
1661  float gridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize);
1662  BoundingBoxD localAABB = new BoundingBoxD(-CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f, CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f);
1663  MatrixD gizmoMatrix = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd;
1664  gizmoMatrix.Translation = FreePlacementTarget;
1665  MatrixD inverseDrawMatrix = MatrixD.Invert(gizmoMatrix);
1666  if (!MyCubeBuilderGizmo.DefaultGizmoCloseEnough(ref inverseDrawMatrix, localAABB, gridSize, IntersectionDistance))
1667  IntersectionDistance = previousIntersectionDistance;
1668  }
1669  }
1670 
1671  return true;
1672  }
1673  else if ((ctrl && MyInput.Static.PreviousMouseScrollWheelValue() > MyInput.Static.MouseScrollWheelValue())
1674  || MyControllerHelper.IsControl(context, MyControlsSpace.MOVE_CLOSER, MyControlStateType.PRESSED))
1675  {
1676  IntersectionDistance /= 1.1f;
1677  if (IntersectionDistance < CubeBuilderDefinition.MinBlockBuildingDistance)
1678  IntersectionDistance = CubeBuilderDefinition.MinBlockBuildingDistance;
1679 
1680  return true;
1681  }
1682 
1683  return false;
1684  }
1685 
1689  private int GetStandardRotationAxisAndDirection(int index, ref int direction)
1690  {
1691  int axis = -1;
1692 
1693  MatrixD transpose = MatrixD.Transpose(m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd);
1694  Vector3I upAxis = Vector3I.Round(Vector3D.TransformNormal(Vector3D.Up, transpose));
1695 
1696  if (MyInput.Static.IsAnyShiftKeyPressed())
1697  direction *= -1;
1698 
1699  if (DynamicMode)
1700  {
1701  int[] axes = new int[] { 1, 1, 0, 0, 2, 2 };
1702  Debug.Assert(axes.Length > index);
1703  return axes[index];
1704  }
1705 
1706  var singleMountPointNormal = GetSingleMountPointNormal();
1707  if (singleMountPointNormal != null)
1708  {
1709  var normal = singleMountPointNormal.Value;
1710  int dotUp = Vector3I.Dot(ref normal, ref Vector3I.Up);
1711  int dotRight = Vector3I.Dot(ref normal, ref Vector3I.Right);
1712  int dotForward = Vector3I.Dot(ref normal, ref Vector3I.Forward);
1713 
1714  if (dotUp == 1 || dotUp == -1)
1715  {
1716  axis = 1;
1717  direction *= dotUp;
1718  }
1719  else if (dotRight == 1 || dotRight == -1)
1720  {
1721  axis = 0;
1722  direction *= dotRight;
1723  }
1724  else if (dotForward == 1 || dotForward == -1)
1725  {
1726  axis = 2;
1727  direction *= dotForward;
1728  }
1729  }
1730  else if (index < 2)
1731  {
1732  // Vertical axis
1733  int dotUp = Vector3I.Dot(ref upAxis, ref Vector3I.Up);
1734  int dotRight = Vector3I.Dot(ref upAxis, ref Vector3I.Right);
1735  int dotForward = Vector3I.Dot(ref upAxis, ref Vector3I.Forward);
1736 
1737  if (dotUp == 1 || dotUp == -1)
1738  {
1739  axis = 1;
1740  direction *= dotUp;
1741  }
1742  else if (dotRight == 1 || dotRight == -1)
1743  {
1744  axis = 0;
1745  direction *= dotRight;
1746  }
1747  else if (dotForward == 1 || dotForward == -1)
1748  {
1749  axis = 2;
1750  direction *= dotForward;
1751  }
1752  }
1753  else if (index >= 2 && index < 4)
1754  {
1755  // Right axis - perpendicular to global Up and block.Forward (roll dir)
1756  Vector3I rightAxis;
1757  Vector3I blockForward = Vector3I.Round(m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_localMatrixAdd.Forward);
1758  int dotForwardUp = Vector3I.Dot(ref blockForward, ref Vector3I.Up);
1759  if (dotForwardUp == 0)
1760  {
1761  Vector3I.Cross(ref blockForward, ref Vector3I.Up, out rightAxis);
1762  rightAxis = Vector3I.Round(Vector3D.TransformNormal((Vector3)rightAxis, transpose));
1763 
1764  int dotUp = Vector3I.Dot(ref rightAxis, ref Vector3I.Up);
1765  int dotRight = Vector3I.Dot(ref rightAxis, ref Vector3I.Right);
1766  int dotForward = Vector3I.Dot(ref rightAxis, ref Vector3I.Forward);
1767 
1768  if (dotUp == 1 || dotUp == -1)
1769  {
1770  axis = 1;
1771  direction *= dotUp;
1772  }
1773  else if (dotRight == 1 || dotRight == -1)
1774  {
1775  axis = 0;
1776  // Do not set direction according to dot (or model will not be rotated in all positions but only in 2)!
1777  //direction *= dotRight;
1778  }
1779  else if (dotForward == 1 || dotForward == -1)
1780  {
1781  axis = 2;
1782  direction *= dotForward;
1783  }
1784  }
1785  else
1786  {
1787  // Use block's right
1788  axis = 0;
1789  }
1790  }
1791  else if (index >= 4)
1792  {
1793  // Roll uses local model Z axis
1794  axis = 2;
1795  }
1796 
1797  return axis;
1798  }

1837  public static void PrepareCharacterCollisionPoints(List<Vector3D> outList)
1838  {
1839  MyCharacter character = (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity as MyCharacter);
1840  if (character == null) return;
1841 
1842  float height = character.Definition.CharacterCollisionHeight * 0.7f;
1843  float width = character.Definition.CharacterCollisionWidth * 0.2f;
1844 
1845  if (character != null)
1846  {
1847  if (character.IsCrouching)
1848  height = character.Definition.CharacterCollisionCrouchHeight;
1849 
1850  Vector3 upVec = character.PositionComp.LocalMatrix.Up * height;
1851  Vector3 fwVec = character.PositionComp.LocalMatrix.Forward * width;
1852  Vector3 rtVec = character.PositionComp.LocalMatrix.Right * width;
1853  Vector3D pos = character.Entity.PositionComp.GetPosition() + character.PositionComp.LocalMatrix.Up * 0.2f;
1854 
1855  float angle = 0.0f;
1856  for (int i = 0; i < 6; ++i)
1857  {
1858  float sin = (float)Math.Sin(angle);
1859  float cos = (float)Math.Cos(angle);
1860  Vector3D bottomPoint = pos + sin * rtVec + cos * fwVec;
1861  outList.Add(bottomPoint);
1862  outList.Add(bottomPoint + upVec);
1863  angle += (float)Math.PI / 3.0f;
1864  }
1865  }
1866  }

1886  else if (CurrentGrid != null)

1910  private void UpdateGizmo_DynamicMode(MyCubeBuilderGizmo.MyGizmoSpaceProperties gizmoSpace)
1911  {
1912  Debug.Assert(DynamicMode);
1913  gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress = 1;
1914 
1915  float gridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize);
1916  BoundingBoxD localAABB = new BoundingBoxD(-CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f, CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f);
1917 
1918  var settings = CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize == MyCubeSize.Large ? CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.LargeGrid : CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.SmallGrid;
1919  MatrixD drawMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_worldMatrixAdd;
1920 
1921  MyCubeGrid.GetCubeParts(CurrentBlockDefinition, Vector3I.Zero, Matrix.Identity, gridSize, gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp, gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp, gizmoSpace.m_cubeNormals, gizmoSpace.m_patternOffsets);
1922 
1923  if (gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube)
1924  {
1925  //MatrixD invDrawMatrix = MatrixD.Invert(gizmoSpace.m_worldMatrixAdd);
1926 
1927  m_gizmo.AddFastBuildParts(gizmoSpace, CurrentBlockDefinition, null);
1928  m_gizmo.UpdateGizmoCubeParts(gizmoSpace, m_renderData, ref MatrixD.Identity, CurrentBlockDefinition);
1929  }
1930 
1931  BuildComponent.GetGridSpawnMaterials(CurrentBlockDefinition, drawMatrix, false);
1932  if (MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId) == false)
1933  {
1934  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed &= BuildComponent.HasBuildingMaterials(MySession.Static.LocalCharacter);
1935  }
1936 
1937 
1938  MatrixD inverseDrawMatrix = MatrixD.Invert(drawMatrix);
1939  if (MySession.Static.SurvivalMode && !SpectatorIsBuilding && !MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId))
1940  {
1941  if (!MyCubeBuilderGizmo.DefaultGizmoCloseEnough(ref inverseDrawMatrix, localAABB, gridSize, IntersectionDistance)
1942  || MySession.Static.GetCameraControllerEnum() == MyCameraControllerEnum.Spectator)
1943  {
1944  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed = false;
1945  gizmoSpace.m_removeBlock = null;
1946  }
1947 
1948  if (CameraControllerSpectator)
1949  {
1950  gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube = false;
1951  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed = false;
1952  return;
1953  }
1954  }
1955 
1956  // m_buildAllowed is set in shape cast
1957  if (!gizmoSpace.m_dynamicBuildAllowed)
1958  {
1959  bool placementTest = MyCubeGrid.TestBlockPlacementArea(CurrentBlockDefinition, null, drawMatrix, ref settings, localAABB, DynamicMode);//DynamicModeVoxelTest);
1960  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed &= placementTest;
1961  }
1962  gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube = true;
1963 
1964  gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp.Clear();
1965  gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp.Clear();
1966 
1967  m_rotationHints.CalculateRotationHints(drawMatrix, localAABB, !MyHud.MinimalHud && !MyHud.CutsceneHud && MySandboxGame.Config.RotationHints && MyFakes.ENABLE_ROTATION_HINTS);
1968 
1969  // In dynamic mode gizmo cube is shown even if it intersects character
1970  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed &= !IntersectsCharacterOrCamera(gizmoSpace, gridSize, ref inverseDrawMatrix);
1971 
1972  if (gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube)
1973  {
1974  Color color = Color.White;
1975  string lineMaterial = gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed ? "GizmoDrawLine" : "GizmoDrawLineRed";
1976 
1977  if (gizmoSpace.SymmetryPlane == MySymmetrySettingModeEnum.Disabled)
1978  {
1979  MySimpleObjectDraw.DrawTransparentBox(ref drawMatrix,
1980  ref localAABB, ref color, MySimpleObjectRasterizer.Wireframe, 1, 0.04f, lineMaterial: lineMaterial);
1981  }
1982 
1983  AddFastBuildModels(gizmoSpace, MatrixD.Identity, gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp, gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp, gizmoSpace.m_blockDefinition);
1984 
1985  Debug.Assert(gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp.Count == gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp.Count);
1986  for (int i = 0; i < gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp.Count; ++i)
1987  {
1988  string model = gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp[i];
1989  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(model))
1990  {
1991  var mId = MyModel.GetId(model);
1992  m_renderData.AddInstance(mId, gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp[i], ref MatrixD.Identity);
1993  }
1994  }
1995  }
1996  }

1998  private void UpdateGizmo_VoxelMap(MyCubeBuilderGizmo.MyGizmoSpaceProperties gizmoSpace, bool add, bool remove, bool draw)
1999  {
2000 
2001  if (!m_animationLock)
2002  {
2003  gizmoSpace.m_animationLastMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd;
2004  }
2005  MatrixD animationMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd;
2006  if (MySandboxGame.Config.AnimatedRotation && gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress < 1)
2007  {
2008  animationMatrix = MatrixD.Slerp(gizmoSpace.m_animationLastMatrix, gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd, gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress);
2009  }
2010  else if (MySandboxGame.Config.AnimatedRotation && gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress >= 1)
2011  {
2012  m_animationLock = false;
2013  gizmoSpace.m_animationLastMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd;
2014  }
2015 
2016  Color green = new Color(Color.Green * 0.6f, 1f);
2017 
2018  float gridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize);
2019 
2020  Vector3 temp;
2021  Vector3D worldCenter = Vector3D.Zero;
2022  MatrixD drawMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_worldMatrixAdd;
2023  MatrixD localOrientation = animationMatrix.GetOrientation();
2024 
2025  Color color = green;
2026 
2027  gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube = !IntersectsCharacterOrCamera(gizmoSpace, gridSize, ref MatrixD.Identity);
2028 
2029  int posIndex = 0;
2030  for (temp.X = 0; temp.X < CurrentBlockDefinition.Size.X; temp.X++)
2031  for (temp.Y = 0; temp.Y < CurrentBlockDefinition.Size.Y; temp.Y++)
2032  for (temp.Z = 0; temp.Z < CurrentBlockDefinition.Size.Z; temp.Z++)
2033  {
2034  Vector3I gridPosition = gizmoSpace.m_positions[posIndex++];
2035  Vector3D gridRelative = gridPosition * gridSize;
2036  if (!CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.StaticGridAlignToCenter)
2037  gridRelative += new Vector3D(0.5 * gridSize, 0.5 * gridSize, -0.5 * gridSize);
2038  Vector3D tempWorldPos = Vector3D.Transform(gridRelative, gizmoSpace.m_worldMatrixAdd);
2039 
2040  worldCenter += gridRelative;
2041 
2042  MyCubeGrid.GetCubePartsWithoutTopologyCheck(
2043  CurrentBlockDefinition,
2044  gridPosition,
2045  localOrientation,
2046  gridSize,
2047  gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp,
2048  gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp,
2049  gizmoSpace.m_cubeNormals,
2050  gizmoSpace.m_patternOffsets
2051  );
2052 
2053  if (gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube)
2054  {
2055  for (int i = 0; i < gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp.Count; i++)
2056  {
2057  MatrixD modelMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp[i] * gizmoSpace.m_worldMatrixAdd;
2058  modelMatrix.Translation = tempWorldPos;
2059  gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp[i] = modelMatrix;
2060  }
2061  drawMatrix.Translation = tempWorldPos;
2062  MatrixD invDrawMatrix = MatrixD.Invert(localOrientation * drawMatrix);
2063 
2064  m_gizmo.AddFastBuildParts(gizmoSpace, CurrentBlockDefinition, null);
2065  m_gizmo.UpdateGizmoCubeParts(gizmoSpace, m_renderData, ref invDrawMatrix, CurrentBlockDefinition);
2066  }
2067  }
2068 
2069  //calculate world center for block model
2070  worldCenter /= CurrentBlockDefinition.Size.Size;
2071  if (!m_animationLock)
2072  {
2073  gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress = 0;
2074  gizmoSpace.m_animationLastPosition = worldCenter;
2075  }
2076  else if (MySandboxGame.Config.AnimatedRotation && gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress < 1)
2077  {
2078  worldCenter = Vector3D.Lerp(gizmoSpace.m_animationLastPosition, worldCenter, gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress);
2079  }
2080  worldCenter = Vector3D.Transform(worldCenter, gizmoSpace.m_worldMatrixAdd);
2081  drawMatrix.Translation = worldCenter;
2082  drawMatrix = localOrientation * drawMatrix;
2083 
2084  BoundingBoxD localAABB = new BoundingBoxD(-CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f, CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f);
2085 
2086  var settings = CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize == MyCubeSize.Large ? CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.LargeStaticGrid : CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.SmallStaticGrid;
2087  MyBlockOrientation blockOrientation = new MyBlockOrientation(ref Quaternion.Identity);
2088  bool placementTest = CheckValidBlockRotation(gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd, CurrentBlockDefinition.Direction, CurrentBlockDefinition.Rotation)
2089  && MyCubeGrid.TestBlockPlacementArea(CurrentBlockDefinition, blockOrientation, drawMatrix, ref settings, localAABB, false);
2090  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed &= placementTest;
2091  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed &= gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube;
2092  gizmoSpace.m_worldMatrixAdd = drawMatrix;
2093 
2094  BuildComponent.GetGridSpawnMaterials(CurrentBlockDefinition, drawMatrix, true);
2095  if (MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId) == false)
2096  {
2097  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed &= BuildComponent.HasBuildingMaterials(MySession.Static.LocalCharacter);
2098  }
2099 
2100  if (MySession.Static.SurvivalMode && !SpectatorIsBuilding && MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId) == false)
2101  {
2102  BoundingBoxD gizmoBox = localAABB.TransformFast(ref drawMatrix);
2103 
2104  if (!MyCubeBuilderGizmo.DefaultGizmoCloseEnough(ref MatrixD.Identity, gizmoBox, gridSize, IntersectionDistance) || CameraControllerSpectator)
2105  {
2106  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed = false;
2107  gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube = false;
2108  gizmoSpace.m_removeBlock = null;
2109  return;
2110  }
2111  }
2112 
2113 
2114  color = Color.White;
2115  string lineMaterial = gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed ? "GizmoDrawLine" : "GizmoDrawLineRed";
2116 
2117  if (gizmoSpace.SymmetryPlane == MySymmetrySettingModeEnum.Disabled)
2118  {
2119  MySimpleObjectDraw.DrawTransparentBox(ref drawMatrix,
2120  ref localAABB, ref color, MySimpleObjectRasterizer.Wireframe, 1, 0.04f, lineMaterial: lineMaterial);
2121 
2122  m_rotationHints.CalculateRotationHints(drawMatrix, localAABB, !MyHud.MinimalHud && !MyHud.CutsceneHud && MySandboxGame.Config.RotationHints && draw && MyFakes.ENABLE_ROTATION_HINTS);
2123  }
2124 
2125  gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp.Clear();
2126  gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp.Clear();
2127 
2128  if (gizmoSpace.m_showGizmoCube)
2129  {

2131  if (MyDebugDrawSettings.ENABLE_DEBUG_DRAW && MyDebugDrawSettings.DEBUG_DRAW_MOUNT_POINTS)
2132  {
2133  DrawMountPoints(gridSize, CurrentBlockDefinition, ref drawMatrix);
2134  }
2135 
2136  AddFastBuildModels(gizmoSpace, MatrixD.Identity, gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp, gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp, gizmoSpace.m_blockDefinition);
2137 
2138  Debug.Assert(gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp.Count == gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp.Count);
2139  for (int i = 0; i < gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp.Count; ++i)
2140  {
2141  string model = gizmoSpace.m_cubeModelsTemp[i];
2142  if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(model))
2143  m_renderData.AddInstance(MyModel.GetId(model), gizmoSpace.m_cubeMatricesTemp[i], ref MatrixD.Identity);
2144  }
2145  }
2146  gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress += m_animationSpeed;
2147  }

2149  private void UpdateGizmo_Grid(MyCubeBuilderGizmo.MyGizmoSpaceProperties gizmoSpace, bool add, bool remove, bool draw)
2150  {
2151  ProfilerShort.Begin("Colors");
2152  Color green = new Color(Color.Green * 0.6f, 1f);
2153  Color red = new Color(Color.Red * 0.8f, 1);
2154  Color yellow = Color.Yellow;
2155  Color black = Color.Black;
2156  Color gray = Color.Gray;
2157  Color white = Color.White;
2158 
2159  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Add");
2160  if (add)
2161  {
2162  if (!m_animationLock)
2163  {
2164  gizmoSpace.m_animationLastMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd;
2165  }
2166  MatrixD animationMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd;
2167  if (MySandboxGame.Config.AnimatedRotation && gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress < 1)
2168  {
2169  animationMatrix = MatrixD.Slerp(gizmoSpace.m_animationLastMatrix, gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd, gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress);
2170  }
2171  else if (MySandboxGame.Config.AnimatedRotation && gizmoSpace.m_animationProgress >= 1)
2172  {
2173  m_animationLock = false;
2174  gizmoSpace.m_animationLastMatrix = gizmoSpace.m_localMatrixAdd;
2175  }

2177 
2178 
2179  if (gizmoSpace.m_startBuild != null && gizmoSpace.m_continueBuild != null)
2180  {

2182  }
2183 
2184  if (PlacingSmallGridOnLargeStatic && gizmoSpace.m_positionsSmallOnLarge.Count == 0)
2185  {
2186  ProfilerShort.End();
2187  return;
2188  }
2189 
2190  ProfilerShort.Begin("CurrentBlockDefinition");
2191  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null)
2192  {

2195  MyBlockOrientation gizmoAddOrientation = new MyBlockOrientation(ref addOrientationMat);
2196 
2197  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("PlacingSmallGridOnLargeStatic");

2200  {

2207  ProfilerShort.End();
2208  }
2209 
2210  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("IsAdminModeEnabled");
2211  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBlockPlacementMaterials(gizmoSpace.m_blockDefinition, gizmoSpace.m_addPos, gizmoAddOrientation, CurrentGrid);
2212  if (MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId) == false)
2213  {
2214  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed &= MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.HasBuildingMaterials(MySession.Static.LocalCharacter);
2215  }
2216

2218  // In survival, check whether you're close enough, and have enough materials or haven't built for long enough
2219  if (!PlacingSmallGridOnLargeStatic && MySession.Static.SurvivalMode && MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId) == false && !SpectatorIsBuilding)
2220  {
2221  Vector3 localMin = (m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_min - new Vector3(0.5f)) * CurrentGrid.GridSize;
2222  Vector3 localMax = (m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_max + new Vector3(0.5f)) * CurrentGrid.GridSize;
2223  BoundingBoxD gizmoBox = new BoundingBoxD(localMin, localMax);
2224 
2225  if (!MyCubeBuilderGizmo.DefaultGizmoCloseEnough(ref m_invGridWorldMatrix, gizmoBox, CurrentGrid.GridSize, IntersectionDistance) || CameraControllerSpectator)
2226  {
2227  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed = false;
2228  gizmoSpace.m_removeBlock = null;
2229 
2230  ProfilerShort.End();
2231  ProfilerShort.End();
2232  ProfilerShort.End();
2233  return;
2234  }
2235  }
2236 
2237  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("m_buildAllowed");
2238  // Check whether mount points match any of its neighbors (only if we can build here though).
2239  if (gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed)
2240  {
2241  ProfilerShort.Begin("CreateFromRotationMatrix");

2243 
2244  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("SymmetryPlane");

2249 
2250  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("CheckConnectivity");
2251  gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed = MyCubeGrid.CheckConnectivity(CurrentGrid, CurrentBlockDefinition, mountPoints, ref gizmoSpace.m_rotation, ref gizmoSpace.m_centerPos);
2252 
2253  ProfilerShort.End();
2254  }
2255  ProfilerShort.End();
2256  }
2257 
2258  Color color = green;
2259 
2260  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("DisableInside");
2261  // Disable gizmo cubes when the camera is inside the currently displayed cube or where the character is inside the cube
2262  if (PlacingSmallGridOnLargeStatic)
2263  {

2270  }

2278

2280  int posIndex = 0;
2281  for (temp.X = 0; temp.X < CurrentBlockDefinition.Size.X; temp.X++)
2282  for (temp.Y = 0; temp.Y < CurrentBlockDefinition.Size.Y; temp.Y++)
2283  for (temp.Z = 0; temp.Z < CurrentBlockDefinition.Size.Z; temp.Z++)

2297

2318

2321  MyCubeGrid.GetCubePartsWithoutTopologyCheck(

2396  var settings = CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.GetGridPlacementSettings(CurrentGrid.GridSizeEnum, CurrentGrid.IsStatic);

2569  private bool IntersectsCharacterOrCamera(MyCubeBuilderGizmo.MyGizmoSpaceProperties gizmoSpace, float gridSize, ref MatrixD inverseBlockInGridWorldMatrix)

2596  public static bool CheckValidBlockRotation(Matrix localMatrix, MyBlockDirection blockDirection, MyBlockRotation blockRotation)
2597  {
2598  Vector3I forward = Vector3I.Round(localMatrix.Forward);
2599  Vector3I up = Vector3I.Round(localMatrix.Up);
2600 
2601  int forwardDot = Vector3I.Dot(ref forward, ref forward);
2602  int upDot = Vector3I.Dot(ref up, ref up);
2603 
2604  // Matrix is not aligned to snap directions.
2605  if (forwardDot > 1 || upDot > 1)
2606  {
2607  if (blockDirection == MyBlockDirection.Both)
2608  return true;
2609  return false;
2610  }
2611 
2612  if (blockDirection == MyBlockDirection.Horizontal)
2613  {
2614  if (forward == Vector3I.Up || forward == -Vector3I.Up)
2615  return false;
2616 
2617  if (blockRotation == MyBlockRotation.Vertical && up != Vector3I.Up)
2618  return false;
2619  }
2620 
2621  return true;
2622  }
2623 
2624  public static bool CheckValidBlocksRotation(Matrix gridLocalMatrix, MyCubeGrid grid)
2625  {
2626  Matrix blockLocalMatrix;
2627  bool retval = true;
2628 
2629  foreach (var block in grid.GetBlocks())
2630  {
2631  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
2632  if (compoundBlock != null)
2633  {
2634  foreach (var blockInCompound in compoundBlock.GetBlocks())
2635  {
2636  blockInCompound.Orientation.GetMatrix(out blockLocalMatrix);
2637  blockLocalMatrix = blockLocalMatrix * gridLocalMatrix;
2638 
2639  retval = retval && CheckValidBlockRotation(blockLocalMatrix, blockInCompound.BlockDefinition.Direction, blockInCompound.BlockDefinition.Rotation);
2640  if (!retval)
2641  break;
2642  }
2643  }
2644  else
2645  {
2646  block.Orientation.GetMatrix(out blockLocalMatrix);
2647  blockLocalMatrix = blockLocalMatrix * gridLocalMatrix;
2648 
2649  retval = retval && CheckValidBlockRotation(blockLocalMatrix, block.BlockDefinition.Direction, block.BlockDefinition.Rotation);
2650  }
2651 
2652  if (!retval)
2653  break;
2654  }
2655 
2656  return retval;
2657  }

2672  return;

2678  foreach (var gizmoSpace in m_gizmo.Spaces)

2690  }
2691  }
2692  }

2696

2700  if (MyMusicController.Static != null)
2701  MyMusicController.Static.Building(2000);

2706  private bool IsWithinWorldLimits(long ownerID, string name)
2707  {
2708  if (!MySession.Static.EnableBlockLimits) return true;
2709 
2710  var identity = MySession.Static.Players.TryGetIdentity(ownerID);
2711  bool withinLimits = true;
2712  if (MySession.Static.MaxBlocksPerPlayer != 0 && identity != null)
2713  {
2714  withinLimits &= identity.BlocksBuilt < MySession.Static.MaxBlocksPerPlayer + identity.BlockLimitModifier;
2715  }
2716  short typeLimit = MySession.Static.GetBlockTypeLimit(name);
2717  int typeBuilt;
2718  if (identity != null && typeLimit > 0)
2719  {
2720  withinLimits &= (identity.BlockTypeBuilt.TryGetValue(name, out typeBuilt) ? typeBuilt : 0) < typeLimit;
2721  }
2722  return withinLimits;
2723  }

2725  protected bool AddBlocksToBuildQueueOrSpawn(MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition, ref MatrixD worldMatrixAdd, Vector3I min, Vector3I max, Vector3I center, Quaternion localOrientation)
2726  {

2728  BuildData position = new BuildData();
2729 
2730  if (!IsWithinWorldLimits(MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId, blockDefinition.BlockPairName))
2731  {
2732  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudUnable);
2733  MyHud.Notifications.Add(MyNotificationSingletons.ShipOverLimits);
2734  return false;

2737  if (GridAndBlockValid)
2738  {
2739  if (PlacingSmallGridOnLargeStatic)
2740  {
2741  MatrixD gridWorldMatrix = worldMatrixAdd;
2742  position.Position = gridWorldMatrix.Translation;
2743  if (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity != null)
2744  position.Position -= MySession.Static.ControlledEntity.Entity.PositionComp.GetPosition();
2745  else
2746  position.AbsolutePosition = true;
2747  position.Forward = (Vector3) gridWorldMatrix.Forward;
2748  position.Up = (Vector3) gridWorldMatrix.Up;
2749 
2750  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => RequestGridSpawn, new Author(MySession.Static.LocalCharacterEntityId, MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId), (DefinitionIdBlit)blockDefinition.Id, position, MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId), true, MyPlayer.SelectedColor.PackHSVToUint());
2751  }
2752  else
2753  {
2754  m_blocksBuildQueue.Add(new MyCubeGrid.MyBlockLocation(blockDefinition.Id, min, max, center,
2755  localOrientation, MyEntityIdentifier.AllocateId(), MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId));
2756  }
2757 
2758  added = true;
2759  }
2760  else
2761  {
2762 
2763  position.Position = worldMatrixAdd.Translation;
2764  if (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity != null)
2765  position.Position -= MySession.Static.ControlledEntity.Entity.PositionComp.GetPosition();
2766  else
2767  position.AbsolutePosition = true;
2768  position.Forward = worldMatrixAdd.Forward;
2769  position.Up = worldMatrixAdd.Up;
2770 
2771  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => RequestGridSpawn, new Author(MySession.Static.LocalCharacterEntityId, MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId), (DefinitionIdBlit)blockDefinition.Id, position, MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId), false, MyPlayer.SelectedColor.PackHSVToUint());
2772  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudPlaceBlock);
2773  added = true;
2774  }
2775 
2776  return added;
2777 
2778  }

2785  private void UpdateGizmos(bool addPos, bool removePos, bool draw)
2786  {
2787  if (CurrentBlockDefinition == null)
2788  return;
2789 
2790  if (CurrentGrid != null && CurrentGrid.Physics != null && CurrentGrid.Physics.RigidBody.HasProperty(HkCharacterRigidBody.MANIPULATED_OBJECT))

2800  if(CurrentGrid!=null)
2801  m_invGridWorldMatrix = MatrixD.Invert(CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix);
2802  for (int i = 0; i < gizmoCt; i++)
2803  {
2804  var gizmoSpace = m_gizmo.Spaces[i];
2805

2814  }
2815  else

2818  removePos &= UseSymmetry;
2819  }
2820

2827  public MyOrientedBoundingBoxD GetBuildBoundingBox(float inflate = 0.0f)
2828  {
2829  if (m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_blockDefinition == null)
2830  return new MyOrientedBoundingBoxD();
2831  float scale = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_blockDefinition.CubeSize);
2832  Vector3 halfExtents = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_blockDefinition.Size * scale * 0.5f + inflate;
2833 
2834  MatrixD m = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd;
2835 
2836  // CH: Don't ask me why this correction has to be applied, but it's apparently correct :-)
2837  if (m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_removeBlock != null && !m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_addPosSmallOnLarge.HasValue)
2838  {
2839  var block = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_removeBlock;
2840  var pos = Vector3D.Transform(m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_addPos * scale, block.CubeGrid.PositionComp.WorldMatrix);
2841  m.Translation = pos;
2842  }
2843  Vector3D minPos = Vector3D.Zero - halfExtents;
2844  Vector3D maxPos = Vector3D.Zero + halfExtents;
2845  return new MyOrientedBoundingBoxD(new BoundingBoxD((Vector3D)minPos, (Vector3D)maxPos), m);
2846  }

2855  public virtual bool AddConstruction(MyEntity builder)
2856  {
2857  var controllingPlayer = Sync.Players.GetControllingPlayer(builder);
2858 
2859  if (canBuild == false ||(controllingPlayer != null && controllingPlayer.IsLocalPlayer == false)) return false;
2860 
2861  if (controllingPlayer == null || controllingPlayer.IsRemotePlayer)
2862  {
2863  var cockpit = (builder as MyCharacter).IsUsing;
2864  if (cockpit != null)
2865  {
2866  controllingPlayer = Sync.Players.GetControllingPlayer(cockpit);
2867  if (controllingPlayer == null || controllingPlayer.IsRemotePlayer)
2868  {
2869  Debug.Assert(controllingPlayer != null && controllingPlayer.IsLocalPlayer, "Only local players can call AddConstruction!");
2870  return false;
2871  }
2872  }
2873  else
2874  {
2875  Debug.Assert(controllingPlayer != null && controllingPlayer.IsLocalPlayer, "Only local players can call AddConstruction! (cockpit is null)");
2876  return false;
2877  }
2878  }
2879 
2880  var gizmoSpace = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault;
2881 
2882  if (gizmoSpace.Enabled && BuildInputValid && gizmoSpace.m_buildAllowed && canBuild && !MyEntities.MemoryLimitReachedReport)
2883  {
2884  m_blocksBuildQueue.Clear();
2885  bool added = AddBlocksToBuildQueueOrSpawn(gizmoSpace);
2886  if (added)
2887  {
2888  if (CurrentGrid != null && m_blocksBuildQueue.Count > 0)
2889  {
2890  if (MySession.Static != null && builder == MySession.Static.LocalCharacter && MyMusicController.Static != null)
2891  MyMusicController.Static.Building(2000);
2892  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudPlaceBlock);
2893  if (builder == MySession.Static.LocalCharacter)
2894  MySession.Static.TotalBlocksCreated++;
2895  CurrentGrid.BuildBlocks(MyPlayer.SelectedColor, m_blocksBuildQueue, builder.EntityId, controllingPlayer.Identity.IdentityId);
2896  }
2897  }
2898  return added;
2899  }
2900 
2901  return false;
2902  }

2904  private Vector3I MakeCubePosition(Vector3 position)
2905  {
2906  position = position - CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.Translation;
2907  Vector3 size = new Vector3(CurrentGrid.GridSize);
2908  Vector3 div = position / size;
2909  Vector3I posInt;
2910  posInt.X = (int)Math.Round(div.X);
2911  posInt.Y = (int)Math.Round(div.Y);
2912  posInt.Z = (int)Math.Round(div.Z);
2913  return posInt;
2914  }

2921  public virtual bool GetAddAndRemovePositions(float gridSize, bool placingSmallGridOnLargeStatic, out Vector3I addPos, out Vector3? addPosSmallOnLarge, out Vector3I addDir, out Vector3I removePos, out MySlimBlock removeBlock,
2922  out ushort? compoundBlockId, HashSet<Tuple<MySlimBlock, ushort?>> removeBlocksInMultiBlock)
2923  {
2924  bool result = false;
2925 
2926  addPosSmallOnLarge = null;
2927  removePos = new Vector3I();
2928  removeBlock = null;
2929 
2930  MySlimBlock intersectedBlock;
2931  Vector3D intersectedBlockPos;
2932  Vector3D intersectionBlockExact;
2933  result = GetBlockAddPosition(gridSize, placingSmallGridOnLargeStatic, out intersectedBlock, out intersectedBlockPos, out intersectionBlockExact, out addPos, out addDir, out compoundBlockId);
2934  Debug.Assert(intersectedBlock == null || intersectedBlock.CubeGrid == CurrentGrid);
2935  if (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity is MyShipController && m_currentGrid.Equals((MySession.Static.ControlledEntity as MyShipController).CubeGrid)) return false;
2936 
2937  float currentGridSize = placingSmallGridOnLargeStatic ? CurrentGrid.GridSize : gridSize;
2938 
2939  if (result && (MaxGridDistanceFrom == null
2940  || Vector3D.DistanceSquared(intersectionBlockExact * currentGridSize, Vector3.Transform(MaxGridDistanceFrom.Value, m_invGridWorldMatrix)) < (CubeBuilderDefinition.MaxBlockBuildingDistance * CubeBuilderDefinition.MaxBlockBuildingDistance)))
2941  {
2942  removePos = Vector3I.Round(intersectedBlockPos);
2943  removeBlock = intersectedBlock;
2944  }
2945  else if (AllowFreeSpacePlacement && CurrentGrid != null)
2946  {
2947  Vector3D intersectionPos = IntersectionStart + IntersectionDirection * Math.Min(FreeSpacePlacementDistance, IntersectionDistance);
2948  addPos = MakeCubePosition(intersectionPos);
2949  addDir = new Vector3I(0, 0, 1);
2950  removePos = addPos - addDir;
2951  removeBlock = CurrentGrid.GetCubeBlock(removePos);
2952 
2953  result = true;
2954  }
2955  else
2956  {
2957  result = false;
2958  }
2959  if (MyCubeBuilder.Static.canBuild == false) return false;
2960 
2961  // Placing small on large grid
2962  if (result && placingSmallGridOnLargeStatic)
2963  {
2964  MatrixD placingRotationMatrix = Matrix.Identity;
2965  if (intersectedBlock != null)
2966  {
2967  placingRotationMatrix = intersectedBlock.CubeGrid.WorldMatrix.GetOrientation();
2968 
2969  if (intersectedBlock.FatBlock != null)
2970  {
2971  if (compoundBlockId != null)
2972  {
2973  MyCompoundCubeBlock cmpCubeBlock = intersectedBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
2974  if (cmpCubeBlock != null)
2975  {
2976  var blockInCompound = cmpCubeBlock.GetBlock(compoundBlockId.Value);
2977  if (blockInCompound != null && blockInCompound.FatBlock.Components.Has<MyFractureComponentBase>())
2978  return false;
2979  }
2980  }
2981  else
2982  {
2983  if (intersectedBlock.FatBlock.Components.Has<MyFractureComponentBase>())
2984  return false;
2985  }
2986  }
2987  }
2988  MatrixD placingRotationMatrixInv = MatrixD.Invert(placingRotationMatrix);
2989 
2990  if (m_hitInfo.HasValue)
2991  {
2992  Vector3 hitInfoNormal = Vector3.TransformNormal(m_hitInfo.Value.HkHitInfo.Normal,m_invGridWorldMatrix);
2993  addDir = Vector3I.Sign(Vector3.DominantAxisProjection(hitInfoNormal));
2994  }
2995 
2996  // Because intersection can be out of cube (on edges) then we must clamp intersection inside (we need that created block will touch side not edge with target block)
2997  // Calculated in local intersected object coordinates
2998  Vector3 sideCenter = removePos + 0.5f * addDir;
2999  Vector3 sideCenterToIntersectionExact = intersectionBlockExact - sideCenter;
3000  const float clampSideValue = 0.495f;
3001  // Direction axis filter (use the same value)
3002  Vector3I dirFilter = Vector3I.Abs(addDir);
3003  // Inverse direction filter (use clamped side values)
3004  Vector3I invDirFilter = Vector3I.One - dirFilter;
3005  sideCenterToIntersectionExact = invDirFilter * Vector3.Clamp(sideCenterToIntersectionExact, new Vector3(-clampSideValue), new Vector3(clampSideValue))
3006  + dirFilter * sideCenterToIntersectionExact;
3007 
3008  Vector3D localIntersectionExact = sideCenter + sideCenterToIntersectionExact;
3009  float smallToLarge = gridSize / CurrentGrid.GridSize;
3010  // Note that there is 0.1 coef instead of 0.5 - because we need that small block is into large one when intersection is not on sides.
3011  float moveAtNormal = MyFakes.ENABLE_VR_BUILDING ? 0.25f : 0.1f;
3012  Vector3I addPosSmallOnLargeInt = Vector3I.Round((localIntersectionExact + moveAtNormal * smallToLarge * addDir - smallToLarge * Vector3.Half) / smallToLarge);
3013  addPosSmallOnLarge = smallToLarge * addPosSmallOnLargeInt + smallToLarge * Vector3.Half;
3014  }
3015 
3016 
3017 
3018  Debug.Assert(!result || addDir != Vector3I.Zero, "Direction vector cannot be zero");
3019  return result;
3020  }
3021

3072  protected void RemoveBlock(MySlimBlock block, ushort? blockIdInCompound, bool checkExisting = false)
3073  {
3074  if (block != null && (block.FatBlock == null || !block.FatBlock.IsSubBlock))
3075  {
3076  if (block.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
3077  {
3078  if (blockIdInCompound.HasValue)
3079  {
3080  if (!checkExisting || !m_tmpCompoundBlockPositionIdList.Exists(t => t.Item1 == block.Min && t.Item2 == blockIdInCompound.Value))
3081  m_tmpCompoundBlockPositionIdList.Add(new Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>(block.Min, blockIdInCompound.Value));
3082  }
3083  else
3084  {
3085  // Remove whole compound
3086  if (!checkExisting || !m_tmpBlockPositionList.Contains(block.Min))
3087  m_tmpBlockPositionList.Add(block.Min);
3088  }
3089  }
3090  else
3091  {
3092  if (!checkExisting || !m_tmpBlockPositionList.Contains(block.Min))
3093  m_tmpBlockPositionList.Add(block.Min);
3094  }
3095  }

3487  protected void ContinueBuilding(bool planeBuild, Vector3I? startBuild, Vector3I? startRemove, ref Vector3I? continueBuild, Vector3I blockMinPosision, Vector3I blockMaxPosition)
3488  {
3489  if (!startBuild.HasValue && !startRemove.HasValue)
3490  return;
3491 
3492  if (!GridAndBlockValid && !VoxelMapAndBlockValid)
3493  return;
3494 
3495  continueBuild = null;
3496 
3497  // Avoid sudden appearing right after player clicked (wait until he moved mouse at least a little).
3498  if (CheckSmallViewChange())
3499  return;
3500 
3501  IntersectInflated(m_cacheGridIntersections, CurrentGrid);
3502 
3503  Vector3I minGizmo = startBuild.HasValue ? blockMinPosision : startRemove.Value;
3504  Vector3I maxGizmo = startBuild.HasValue ? blockMaxPosition : startRemove.Value;
3505  Vector3I startValue;
3506  for (startValue.X = minGizmo.X; startValue.X <= maxGizmo.X; startValue.X++)
3507  for (startValue.Y = minGizmo.Y; startValue.Y <= maxGizmo.Y; startValue.Y++)
3508  for (startValue.Z = minGizmo.Z; startValue.Z <= maxGizmo.Z; startValue.Z++)
3509  {
3510  if (planeBuild)
3511  { //We have to find intersection with most user friendly normal to camera
3512  foreach (Vector3I intersection in m_cacheGridIntersections)
3513  {
3514  if ((intersection.X == startValue.X)
3515  ||
3516  (intersection.Y == startValue.Y)
3517  ||
3518  (intersection.Z == startValue.Z))
3519  {
3520  Vector3 axis1 = Vector3.Zero;
3521  Vector3 axis2 = Vector3.Zero;
3522 
3523  if (intersection.X == startValue.X)
3524  {
3525  if (CurrentGrid != null)
3526  {
3527  axis1 = CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.Up;
3528  axis2 = CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.Forward;
3529  }
3530  else
3531  {
3532  axis1 = Vector3.Up;
3533  axis2 = Vector3.Forward;
3534  }
3535  }
3536  else
3537  if (intersection.Y == startValue.Y)
3538  {
3539  if (CurrentGrid != null)
3540  {
3541  axis1 = CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.Right;
3542  axis2 = CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.Forward;
3543  }
3544  else
3545  {
3546  axis1 = Vector3.Right;
3547  axis2 = Vector3.Forward;
3548  }
3549  }
3550  else
3551  if (intersection.Z == startValue.Z)
3552  {
3553  if (CurrentGrid != null)
3554  {
3555  axis1 = CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.Up;
3556  axis2 = CurrentGrid.WorldMatrix.Right;
3557  }
3558  else
3559  {
3560  axis1 = Vector3.Up;
3561  axis2 = Vector3.Right;
3562  }
3563  }
3564 
3565  Vector3I counter = Vector3I.Abs(intersection - startValue) + Vector3I.One;
3566 
3567  if (counter.Size < MAX_CUBES_BUILT_AT_ONCE && counter.AbsMax() <= MAX_CUBES_BUILT_IN_ONE_AXIS)
3568  {
3569  continueBuild = intersection;
3570  break;
3571  }
3572  }
3573  }
3574  }
3575  else
3576  {
3577  foreach (Vector3I intersection in m_cacheGridIntersections)
3578  {
3579  if (((intersection.X == startValue.X) &&
3580  (intersection.Y == startValue.Y))
3581  ||
3582  ((intersection.Y == startValue.Y) &&
3583  (intersection.Z == startValue.Z))
3584  ||
3585  ((intersection.X == startValue.X) &&
3586  (intersection.Z == startValue.Z)))
3587  {
3588  if ((intersection - startValue + Vector3I.One).AbsMax() <= MAX_CUBES_BUILT_IN_ONE_AXIS)
3589  {
3590  continueBuild = intersection;
3591  break;
3592  }
3593  }
3594  }
3595  }
3596  }
3597  }

3640 
3641  if (m_tmpBlockPositionList.Count > 0)
3642  {
3643  CurrentGrid.RazeBlocks(m_tmpBlockPositionList);
3644  m_tmpBlockPositionList.Clear();
3645  }
3646  }

3651  protected void StopBuilding(bool smallViewChange, ref Vector3I? startBuild, ref Vector3I? startRemove, ref Vector3I? continueBuild, Vector3I blockMinPosition, Vector3I blockMaxPosition,
3652  Vector3I blockCenterPosition, ref Matrix localMatrixAdd, MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition)
3653  {
3654  if (startBuild != null && (continueBuild != null || smallViewChange))
3655  {
3656  Vector3I min = blockMinPosition - blockCenterPosition;
3657  Vector3I max = blockMaxPosition - blockCenterPosition;
3658 
3659  Vector3I rotatedSize;
3660  Vector3I.TransformNormal(ref CurrentBlockDefinition.Size, ref localMatrixAdd, out rotatedSize);
3661  rotatedSize = Vector3I.Abs(rotatedSize);
3662 
3663  Vector3I stepDelta;
3664  Vector3I counter;
3665  int stepCount;
3666 
3667  if (smallViewChange)
3668  continueBuild = startBuild;
3669 
3670  ComputeSteps(startBuild.Value, continueBuild.Value, rotatedSize, out stepDelta, out counter, out stepCount);
3671 
3672  Vector3I centerPos = blockCenterPosition;
3673  Quaternion orientation = Quaternion.CreateFromRotationMatrix(localMatrixAdd);
3674  MyDefinitionId definitionId = blockDefinition.Id;
3675 
3676  // Blocks can be randomly rotated if line/plane building is used.
3677  bool allowRandomRotation = blockDefinition.RandomRotation
3678  && blockDefinition.Size.X == blockDefinition.Size.Y && blockDefinition.Size.X == blockDefinition.Size.Z
3679  && (blockDefinition.Rotation == MyBlockRotation.Both || blockDefinition.Rotation == MyBlockRotation.Vertical);
3680 
3681  if (allowRandomRotation)
3682  {
3683  m_blocksBuildQueue.Clear();
3684 
3685  Vector3I temp;
3686  for (temp.X = 0; temp.X < counter.X; ++temp.X)
3687  {
3688  for (temp.Y = 0; temp.Y < counter.Y; ++temp.Y)
3689  {
3690  for (temp.Z = 0; temp.Z < counter.Z; ++temp.Z)
3691  {
3692  Vector3I tempCenter = blockCenterPosition + temp * stepDelta;
3693  Vector3I tempMin = blockMinPosition + temp * stepDelta;
3694  Vector3I tempMax = blockMaxPosition + temp * stepDelta;
3695 
3696  Quaternion tempOrientation;
3697 
3698  if (blockDefinition.Rotation == MyBlockRotation.Both)
3699  {
3700  Base6Directions.Direction forward = (Base6Directions.Direction)(Math.Abs(MyRandom.Instance.Next()) % 6);
3701  Base6Directions.Direction up = forward;
3702 
3703  while (Vector3I.Dot(Base6Directions.GetIntVector(forward), Base6Directions.GetIntVector(up)) != 0)
3704  up = (Base6Directions.Direction)(Math.Abs(MyRandom.Instance.Next()) % 6);
3705 
3706  tempOrientation = Quaternion.CreateFromForwardUp(Base6Directions.GetIntVector(forward), Base6Directions.GetIntVector(up));
3707  }
3708  else
3709  {
3710  Base6Directions.Direction up = Base6Directions.Direction.Up;
3711  Base6Directions.Direction forward = up;
3712 
3713  while (Vector3I.Dot(Base6Directions.GetIntVector(forward), Base6Directions.GetIntVector(up)) != 0)
3714  forward = (Base6Directions.Direction)(Math.Abs(MyRandom.Instance.Next()) % 6);
3715 
3716  tempOrientation = Quaternion.CreateFromForwardUp(Base6Directions.GetIntVector(forward), Base6Directions.GetIntVector(up));
3717  }
3718 
3719  m_blocksBuildQueue.Add(new MyCubeGrid.MyBlockLocation(blockDefinition.Id, tempMin, tempMax, tempCenter, tempOrientation,
3720  MyEntityIdentifier.AllocateId(), MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId));
3721  }
3722  }
3723  }
3724  if (m_blocksBuildQueue.Count > 0)
3725  {
3726  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudPlaceBlock);
3727  }
3728  }
3729  else
3730  {
3731  // New version of build code
3732  MyCubeGrid.MyBlockBuildArea area = new MyCubeGrid.MyBlockBuildArea();
3733  area.PosInGrid = centerPos;
3734  area.BlockMin = new Vector3B(min);
3735  area.BlockMax = new Vector3B(max);
3736  area.BuildAreaSize = new Vector3UByte(counter);
3737  area.StepDelta = new Vector3B(stepDelta);
3738  area.OrientationForward = Base6Directions.GetForward(ref orientation);
3739  area.OrientationUp = Base6Directions.GetUp(ref orientation);
3740  area.DefinitionId = definitionId;
3741  area.ColorMaskHSV = MyPlayer.SelectedColor.PackHSVToUint();
3742 
3743  CurrentGrid.BuildBlocks(ref area, MySession.Static.LocalCharacterEntityId, MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId);
3744  }
3745  }
3746  else if (startRemove != null && (continueBuild != null || smallViewChange))
3747  {
3748  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudDeleteBlock);
3749 
3750  Vector3I min = startRemove.Value;
3751  Vector3I max = startRemove.Value;
3752 
3753  Vector3I stepDelta;
3754  Vector3I counter;
3755  int stepCount;
3756  if (smallViewChange)
3757  continueBuild = startRemove;
3758 
3759  ComputeSteps(startRemove.Value, continueBuild.Value, Vector3I.One, out stepDelta, out counter, out stepCount);
3760 
3761  min = Vector3I.Min(startRemove.Value, continueBuild.Value);
3762  max = Vector3I.Max(startRemove.Value, continueBuild.Value);
3763  var size = new Vector3UByte(max - min);
3764  CurrentGrid.RazeBlocks(ref min, ref size);
3765  }
3766 
3767  startBuild = null;
3768  continueBuild = null;
3769  startRemove = null;
3770  }

3813  private Vector3D GetFreeSpacePlacementPosition(out bool valid)
3814  {
3815  valid = false;
3816 
3817  float gridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize);
3818 
3819  Vector3 halfExt = CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f;
3820  MatrixD matrix = m_gizmo.SpaceDefault.m_worldMatrixAdd;
3821  Vector3D rayStart = IntersectionStart;
3822  Vector3D rayEnd = FreePlacementTarget;
3823  matrix.Translation = rayStart;
3824 
3825  HkShape shape = new HkBoxShape(halfExt);
3826 
3827  double distance = double.MaxValue;
3828 
3829  try
3830  {
3831  float? dist = MyPhysics.CastShape(rayEnd, shape, ref matrix, MyPhysics.CollisionLayers.CollisionLayerWithoutCharacter);
3832  if (dist.HasValue && dist.Value != 0f)
3833  {
3834  Vector3D intersectionPoint = rayStart + dist.Value * (rayEnd - rayStart);
3835  const bool debugDraw = false;
3836  if (debugDraw)
3837  {
3838  Color green = Color.Green;
3839  BoundingBoxD localAABB = new BoundingBoxD(-halfExt, halfExt);
3840  MatrixD drawMatrix = matrix;
3841  drawMatrix.Translation = intersectionPoint;
3842  MySimpleObjectDraw.DrawTransparentBox(ref drawMatrix, ref localAABB, ref green, MySimpleObjectRasterizer.Wireframe, 1, 0.04f);
3843  }
3844 
3845  Vector3D startToIntersection = intersectionPoint - IntersectionStart;
3846  distance = startToIntersection.Length() * 0.98;
3847 
3848  valid = true;
3849  }
3850  }
3851  finally
3852  {
3853  shape.RemoveReference();
3854  }
3855 
3856  float lowLimit = LowLimitDistanceForDynamicMode();
3857  if (distance < lowLimit)
3858  {
3859  distance = IntersectionDistance;
3860  valid = false;
3861  }
3862 
3863  if (distance > IntersectionDistance)
3864  {
3865  distance = IntersectionDistance;
3866  valid = false;
3867  }
3868 
3869  return IntersectionStart + distance * IntersectionDirection;
3870  }
3871 
3872  private float LowLimitDistanceForDynamicMode()
3873  {
3874  if (CurrentBlockDefinition != null)
3875  {
3876  float gridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(CurrentBlockDefinition.CubeSize);
3877  return gridSize + 0.1f;
3878  //Vector3 halfExt = CurrentBlockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f;
3879  //float radius = halfExt.Length();
3880  //return 3 * radius;
3881  }
3882 
3883  return 2.6f;
3884  }

3929  protected static MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid CreateMultiBlockGridBuilder(MyMultiBlockDefinition multiCubeBlockDefinition, Matrix rotationMatrix, Vector3D position = default(Vector3D))
3930  {
3931  Debug.Assert(MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCKS);
3932 
3933  var gridBuilder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid>();
3934  gridBuilder.PositionAndOrientation = new MyPositionAndOrientation(position, rotationMatrix.Forward, rotationMatrix.Up);
3935  gridBuilder.IsStatic = false;
3936  gridBuilder.PersistentFlags |= MyPersistentEntityFlags2.Enabled | MyPersistentEntityFlags2.InScene;
3937 
3938  if (multiCubeBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions == null)
3939  {
3940  Debug.Assert(false);
3941  return null;
3942  }
3943 
3944  MyCubeSize? cubeSize = null;
3945  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
3946  Vector3I max = Vector3I.MinValue;
3947 
3948  int multiblockId = MyRandom.Instance.Next();
3949  while (multiblockId == 0)
3950  multiblockId = MyRandom.Instance.Next();
3951 
3952  for (int i = 0; i < multiCubeBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions.Length; ++i)
3953  {
3954  var multiBlockPartDefinition = multiCubeBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions[i];
3955 
3956  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition;
3957  MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(multiBlockPartDefinition.Id, out blockDefinition);
3958  if (blockDefinition == null)
3959  {
3960  Debug.Assert(false);
3961  continue;
3962  }
3963 
3964  if (cubeSize == null)
3965  {
3966  cubeSize = blockDefinition.CubeSize;
3967  }
3968  else if (cubeSize.Value != blockDefinition.CubeSize)
3969  {
3970  Debug.Assert(false, "Blocks with different sizes cannot be in multi block");
3971  continue;
3972  }
3973 
3974  MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock blockBuilder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject(blockDefinition.Id) as MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock;
3975  blockBuilder.Orientation = Base6Directions.GetOrientation(multiBlockPartDefinition.Forward, multiBlockPartDefinition.Up);
3976  blockBuilder.Min = multiBlockPartDefinition.Min;
3977  blockBuilder.ColorMaskHSV = MyPlayer.SelectedColor;
3978  blockBuilder.MultiBlockId = multiblockId;
3979  blockBuilder.MultiBlockIndex = i;
3980  blockBuilder.MultiBlockDefinition = multiCubeBlockDefinition.Id;
3981  blockBuilder.EntityId = MyEntityIdentifier.AllocateId();
3982 
3983  // Check block on existing position
3984  bool added = false;
3985  {
3986  bool canBeAdded = true;
3987 
3988  bool isValidCompound = MyCompoundCubeBlock.IsCompoundEnabled(blockDefinition);
3989  // Find out existing multiblock
3990  foreach (var existingBlock in gridBuilder.CubeBlocks)
3991  {
3992  if (existingBlock.Min == blockBuilder.Min)
3993  {
3994  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS && (existingBlock is MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock))
3995  {
3996  if (isValidCompound)
3997  {
3998  var existingCB = existingBlock as MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock;
3999  MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock[] blocks = new MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock[existingCB.Blocks.Length + 1];
4000  Array.Copy(existingCB.Blocks, blocks, existingCB.Blocks.Length);
4001  blocks[blocks.Length - 1] = blockBuilder;
4002  existingCB.Blocks = blocks;
4003 
4004  added = true;
4005  }
4006  else
4007  {
4008  Debug.Assert(false, "Block cannot be added to compound (no compound templated defined) in multiblock");
4009  canBeAdded = false;
4010  }
4011  }
4012  else
4013  {
4014  Debug.Assert(false, "Block position already used in multiblock");
4015  canBeAdded = false;
4016  }
4017 
4018  break;
4019  }
4020  }
4021 
4022  if (!canBeAdded)
4023  continue;
4024  }
4025 
4026  if (!added)
4027  {
4028  // Compound block
4029  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS && MyCompoundCubeBlock.IsCompoundEnabled(blockDefinition))
4030  {
4031  MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock compoundCBBuilder = MyCompoundCubeBlock.CreateBuilder(blockBuilder);
4032  gridBuilder.CubeBlocks.Add(compoundCBBuilder);
4033  }
4034  else
4035  {
4036  gridBuilder.CubeBlocks.Add(blockBuilder);
4037  }
4038  }
4039 
4040  min = Vector3I.Min(min, multiBlockPartDefinition.Min);
4041  max = Vector3I.Max(max, multiBlockPartDefinition.Min);
4042  }
4043 
4044  if (gridBuilder.CubeBlocks.Count == 0)
4045  {
4046  Debug.Assert(false);
4047  return null;
4048  }
4049 
4050  gridBuilder.GridSizeEnum = cubeSize.Value;
4051 
4052  return gridBuilder;
4053  }
