4056  {
4057  if (grid != null)
4058  {
4059  MySlimBlock block = grid.GetCubeBlock(Vector3I.Zero);
4060  if (block != null)
4061  {
4062  if (grid.IsStatic)
4063  {
4064  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4065  MySlimBlock blockInCompound = compoundBlock != null && compoundBlock.GetBlocksCount() > 0 ? compoundBlock.GetBlocks()[0] : null;
4066 
4067  MyCubeGrid mainGrid = grid.DetectMerge(block);
4068  if (mainGrid == null)
4069  mainGrid = grid;
4070 
4071  MySlimBlock mainBlock = block;
4072  if (blockInCompound != null)
4073  {
4074  Debug.Assert(blockInCompound.CubeGrid == mainGrid);
4075  mainBlock = mainGrid.GetCubeBlock(blockInCompound.Position);
4076  }
4077 
4078  mainGrid.AdditionalModelGenerators.ForEach(g => g.UpdateAfterGridSpawn(mainBlock));
4079 
4080  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null)
4081  {
4082  if (Sync.IsServer && !MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.AddBlockSmallToLargeConnection(block) && grid.GridSizeEnum == MyCubeSize.Small)
4083  block.CubeGrid.TestDynamic = MyCubeGrid.MyTestDynamicReason.GridCopied;
4084  }
4085  }
4086 
4087  if (Sync.IsServer)
4088  {
4089  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.AfterSuccessfulBuild(builder, instantBuild);
4090  }
4091 
4092  if (block.FatBlock != null)
4093  block.FatBlock.OnBuildSuccess(builder.EntityId);
4094 
4095  MyCubeGrids.NotifyBlockBuilt(grid, block);
4096  }
4097  else
4098  Debug.Fail("Block not created");
4099 
4100 
4101  }

4107  public static MyCubeGrid SpawnStaticGrid(MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition, MyEntity builder, MatrixD worldMatrix, Vector3 color, SpawnFlags spawnFlags = SpawnFlags.Default, long builtBy = 0, Action completionCallback = null)
4108  {
4109  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer, "Only server can spawn grids! Clients have to send requests!");
4110 
4111  var gridBuilder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid>();
4112 
4113  Vector3 offset = Vector3.TransformNormal(MyCubeBlock.GetBlockGridOffset(blockDefinition), worldMatrix);
4114  gridBuilder.PositionAndOrientation = new MyPositionAndOrientation(worldMatrix.Translation - offset, worldMatrix.Forward, worldMatrix.Up);
4115  gridBuilder.GridSizeEnum = blockDefinition.CubeSize;
4116  gridBuilder.IsStatic = true;
4117  gridBuilder.CreatePhysics = (spawnFlags & SpawnFlags.CreatePhysics) != SpawnFlags.None;
4118  gridBuilder.EnableSmallToLargeConnections = (spawnFlags & SpawnFlags.EnableSmallTolargeConnections) != SpawnFlags.None;
4119  gridBuilder.PersistentFlags |= MyPersistentEntityFlags2.Enabled | MyPersistentEntityFlags2.InScene;
4120  if ((spawnFlags & SpawnFlags.AddToScene) != SpawnFlags.None)
4121  gridBuilder.EntityId = MyEntityIdentifier.AllocateId();
4122 
4123  // Block must be placed on (0,0,0) coordinate
4124  var blockBuilder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject(blockDefinition.Id) as MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock;
4125  blockBuilder.Orientation = Quaternion.CreateFromForwardUp(Vector3I.Forward, Vector3I.Up);
4126  blockBuilder.Min = blockDefinition.Size / 2 - blockDefinition.Size + Vector3I.One;
4127  if ((spawnFlags & SpawnFlags.AddToScene) != SpawnFlags.None)
4128  blockBuilder.EntityId = MyEntityIdentifier.AllocateId();
4129  blockBuilder.ColorMaskHSV = color;
4130  blockBuilder.BuiltBy = builtBy;
4131 
4132  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.BeforeCreateBlock(blockDefinition, builder, blockBuilder, buildAsAdmin: (spawnFlags & SpawnFlags.SpawnAsMaster) != SpawnFlags.None);
4133 
4134  gridBuilder.CubeBlocks.Add(blockBuilder);
4135 
4136  MyCubeGrid grid;
4137 
4138  if ((spawnFlags & SpawnFlags.AddToScene) != SpawnFlags.None)
4139  {
4140  grid = MyEntities.CreateFromObjectBuilderParallel(gridBuilder, true, completionCallback, callbackNeedsReplicable: true) as MyCubeGrid;
4141  }
4142  else
4143  {
4144  grid = MyEntities.CreateFromObjectBuilderParallel(gridBuilder, completionCallback: completionCallback, callbackNeedsReplicable: true) as MyCubeGrid;
4145  }
4146 
4147  return grid;
4148  }

4195  public static void SelectBlockToToolbar(MySlimBlock block, bool selectToNextSlot = true)
4196  {
4197  Debug.Assert(block != null && MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar != null);
4198  MyDefinitionId blockId = block.BlockDefinition.Id;
4199  if (block.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
4200  {
4201  var compound = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4202  m_cycle %= compound.GetBlocksCount();
4203  blockId = compound.GetBlocks()[m_cycle].BlockDefinition.Id;
4204  m_cycle++;
4205  }
4206  if (block.FatBlock is MyFracturedBlock)
4207  {
4208  var fracture = block.FatBlock as MyFracturedBlock;
4209  m_cycle %= fracture.OriginalBlocks.Count;
4210  blockId = fracture.OriginalBlocks[m_cycle];
4211  m_cycle++;
4212  }
4213  if (MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar.SelectedSlot.HasValue)
4214  {
4215  int slot = MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar.SelectedSlot.Value;
4216  if (selectToNextSlot)
4217  slot++;
4218  if (!MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar.IsValidSlot(slot))
4219  slot = 0;
4220  var builder = new MyObjectBuilder_ToolbarItemCubeBlock();
4221  builder.DefinitionId = blockId;
4222  var item = MyToolbarItemFactory.CreateToolbarItem(builder);
4223  MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar.SetItemAtSlot(slot, item);
4224  }
4225  else
4226  {
4227  int slot = 0;
4228  while (MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar.GetSlotItem(slot) != null)
4229  slot++;
4230  if (!MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar.IsValidSlot(slot))
4231  slot = 0;
4232 
4233  var builder = new MyObjectBuilder_ToolbarItemCubeBlock();
4234  builder.DefinitionId = blockId;
4235  var item = MyToolbarItemFactory.CreateToolbarItem(builder);
4236  MyToolbarComponent.CurrentToolbar.SetItemAtSlot(slot, item);
4237  }
4238  }

4253  private void TriggerRespawnShipNotification(MyCubeGrid newCurrentGrid)
4254  {
4255  bool warningShown = false;
4256 
4257  if (newCurrentGrid != null && newCurrentGrid.IsRespawnGrid)
4258  {
4259  Sandbox.Game.Gui.MyHud.Notifications.Add(MyNotificationSingletons.RespawnShipWarning);
4260  warningShown = true;
4261  }
4262 
4263  if (!warningShown)
4264  Sandbox.Game.Gui.MyHud.Notifications.Remove(MyNotificationSingletons.RespawnShipWarning);
4265

4268  public static double? GetCurrentRayIntersection()
4269  {
4270  var hitInfo = MyPhysics.CastRay(MyCubeBuilder.IntersectionStart, MyCubeBuilder.IntersectionStart + 2000 * MyCubeBuilder.IntersectionDirection, MyPhysics.CollisionLayers.CollisionLayerWithoutCharacter);
4271  if (hitInfo.HasValue)
4272  {
4273  Vector3D p = hitInfo.Value.Position - MyCubeBuilder.IntersectionStart;
4274  double dist = p.Length();
4275  return dist;
4276  }
4277 
4278  return null;
4279  }

4285  public static Vector3 TransformLargeGridHitCoordToSmallGrid(Vector3D coords, MatrixD worldMatrixNormalizedInv, float gridSize)
4286  {
4287  Vector3D localCoords = Vector3D.Transform(coords, worldMatrixNormalizedInv);
4288  localCoords /= gridSize;
4289  // We have 10 small cubes in large one.
4290  localCoords *= 10f;
4291  Vector3I sign = Vector3I.Sign(localCoords);
4292  // Center of small cube has offset 0.05
4293  localCoords -= 0.5 * sign;
4294  localCoords = sign * Vector3I.Round(Vector3D.Abs(localCoords));
4295  localCoords += 0.5 * sign;
4296  localCoords /= 10;
4297  return localCoords;
4298  }

4300  public static MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid ConvertGridBuilderToStatic(MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid originalGrid, MatrixD worldMatrix)
4301  {
4302  var gridBuilder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid>();
4303  gridBuilder.EntityId = originalGrid.EntityId;
4304  gridBuilder.PositionAndOrientation = new MyPositionAndOrientation(worldMatrix.Translation, worldMatrix.Forward, worldMatrix.Up);
4305  gridBuilder.GridSizeEnum = originalGrid.GridSizeEnum;
4306  gridBuilder.IsStatic = true;
4307  gridBuilder.PersistentFlags |= MyPersistentEntityFlags2.Enabled | MyPersistentEntityFlags2.InScene;
4308 
4309  // Blocks in static grid - must be recreated for static grid with different orientation and position
4310  foreach (var origBlock in originalGrid.CubeBlocks)
4311  {
4312  if (origBlock is MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock)
4313  {
4314  var origBlockCompound = origBlock as MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock;
4315  var blockBuilderCompound = ConvertDynamicGridBlockToStatic(ref worldMatrix, origBlock) as MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock;
4316  Debug.Assert(blockBuilderCompound != null);
4317  if (blockBuilderCompound == null)
4318  continue;
4319 
4320  blockBuilderCompound.Blocks = new MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock[origBlockCompound.Blocks.Length];
4321 
4322  for (int i = 0; i < origBlockCompound.Blocks.Length; ++i)
4323  {
4324  var origBlockInCompound = origBlockCompound.Blocks[i];
4325  var blockBuilder = ConvertDynamicGridBlockToStatic(ref worldMatrix, origBlockInCompound);
4326  if (blockBuilder == null)
4327  continue;
4328 
4329  blockBuilderCompound.Blocks[i] = blockBuilder;
4330  }
4331  gridBuilder.CubeBlocks.Add(blockBuilderCompound);
4332  }
4333  else
4334  {
4335  var blockBuilder = ConvertDynamicGridBlockToStatic(ref worldMatrix, origBlock);
4336  if (blockBuilder == null)
4337  continue;
4338  gridBuilder.CubeBlocks.Add(blockBuilder);
4339  }
4340  }
4341 
4342  return gridBuilder;
4343  }
4344 
4345  public static MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock ConvertDynamicGridBlockToStatic(ref MatrixD worldMatrix, MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock origBlock)
4346  {
4347  MyDefinitionId defId = new MyDefinitionId(origBlock.TypeId, origBlock.SubtypeName);
4348  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition;
4349  MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(defId, out blockDefinition);
4350  if (blockDefinition == null)
4351  return null;
4352 
4353  var blockBuilder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject(defId) as MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock;
4354  blockBuilder.EntityId = origBlock.EntityId;
4355  // Orientation quaternion is not setup in origblock
4356  MyBlockOrientation orientation = origBlock.BlockOrientation;
4357  Quaternion rotationQuat;
4358  orientation.GetQuaternion(out rotationQuat);
4359  Matrix origRotationMatrix = Matrix.CreateFromQuaternion(rotationQuat);
4360  Matrix rotationMatrix = origRotationMatrix * worldMatrix;
4361  //blockBuilder.Orientation = Quaternion.CreateFromRotationMatrix(rotationMatrix);
4362  blockBuilder.Orientation = Quaternion.CreateFromRotationMatrix(origRotationMatrix);
4363 
4364  Vector3I origSizeRotated = Vector3I.Abs(Vector3I.Round(Vector3.TransformNormal((Vector3)blockDefinition.Size, origRotationMatrix)));
4365  Vector3I origMin = origBlock.Min;
4366  Vector3I origMax = origBlock.Min + origSizeRotated - Vector3I.One;
4367 
4368  Vector3I minXForm = Vector3I.Round(Vector3.TransformNormal((Vector3)origMin, worldMatrix));
4369  Vector3I maxXForm = Vector3I.Round(Vector3.TransformNormal((Vector3)origMax, worldMatrix));
4370 
4371  //blockBuilder.Min = Vector3I.Min(minXForm, maxXForm);
4372  blockBuilder.Min = Vector3I.Min(origMin, origMax);
4373 
4374  blockBuilder.MultiBlockId = origBlock.MultiBlockId;
4375  blockBuilder.MultiBlockDefinition = origBlock.MultiBlockDefinition;
4376  blockBuilder.MultiBlockIndex = origBlock.MultiBlockIndex;
4377 
4378  blockBuilder.BuildPercent = origBlock.BuildPercent;
4379  blockBuilder.IntegrityPercent = origBlock.BuildPercent;
4380 
4381  return blockBuilder;
4382  }

4384  public static void GetAllBlocksPositions(HashSet<Tuple<MySlimBlock, ushort?>> blockInCompoundIDs, HashSet<Vector3I> outPositions)
4385  {
4386  foreach (var blockInCompoundID in blockInCompoundIDs)
4387  {
4388  Vector3I cube = blockInCompoundID.Item1.Min;
4389  for (Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref blockInCompoundID.Item1.Min, ref blockInCompoundID.Item1.Max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out cube))
4390  {
4391  outPositions.Add(cube);
4392  }
4393  }
4394  }

4396  [Event,Reliable,Server]
4397  static void RequestGridSpawn(Author author, DefinitionIdBlit definition, BuildData position, bool instantBuild, bool forceStatic, uint colorMaskHsv)
4398  {
4399  Debug.Assert(BuildComponent != null, "The build component was not set in cube builder!");
4400 
4401  MyEntity builder = null;
4402  bool isAdmin = (MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked || MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value) || MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId));
4403  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(author.EntityId, out builder);
4404 
4405  var blockDefinition = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(definition);
4406  var absPosition = position.Position;
4407  if (!position.AbsolutePosition)
4408  absPosition += builder.PositionComp.GetPosition();
4409  MatrixD worldMatrix = MatrixD.CreateWorld(absPosition, position.Forward, position.Up);
4410 
4411  float gridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(blockDefinition.CubeSize);
4412  BoundingBoxD localAABB = new BoundingBoxD(-blockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f, blockDefinition.Size * gridSize * 0.5f);
4413 
4414  MyGridPlacementSettings settings = CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.GetGridPlacementSettings(blockDefinition.CubeSize);
4415  VoxelPlacementSettings voxelPlacementDef = new VoxelPlacementSettings() { PlacementMode = VoxelPlacementMode.OutsideVoxel };
4416  settings.VoxelPlacement = voxelPlacementDef;
4417 
4418  bool isStatic = forceStatic || MyCubeGrid.IsAabbInsideVoxel(worldMatrix, localAABB, settings) || Static.m_stationPlacement;
4419 
4420  BuildComponent.GetGridSpawnMaterials(blockDefinition, worldMatrix, isStatic);
4421  bool hasBuildMat = (isAdmin && instantBuild) || MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.HasBuildingMaterials(builder);
4422 
4423  bool canSpawn = true;
4424  // Try spawning "fake" grid in that place, if fail it means something already there.
4425  // TODO: broken for armor blocks. Rendering instance stays on the screen after creating temp grid
4426  //if (isStatic)
4427  //{
4428  // canSpawn = GridPlacementTest(builder, blockDefinition, worldMatrix);
4429  //}
4430  canSpawn = hasBuildMat & canSpawn; // It is not possible to create something in already occupied place, even if admin.
4431 
4432  ulong senderId = MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value;
4433 
4434  if(senderId == 0)
4435  SpawnGridReply(canSpawn);
4436  else
4437  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => SpawnGridReply, canSpawn, new EndpointId(senderId));
4438 
4439  if (!canSpawn) return;
4440 
4441  MyCubeGrid grid = null;
4442  SpawnFlags flags = SpawnFlags.Default;
4443  if (isAdmin && instantBuild)
4444  {
4445  flags |= SpawnFlags.SpawnAsMaster;
4446  }
4447 
4448  Vector3 color = ColorExtensions.UnpackHSVFromUint(colorMaskHsv);
4449 
4450  if (isStatic)
4451  {
4452  grid = SpawnStaticGrid(blockDefinition, builder, worldMatrix, color, flags, author.IdentityId, completionCallback: delegate() { AfterGridBuild(builder, grid, instantBuild); });
4453  }
4454  else
4455  grid = SpawnDynamicGrid(blockDefinition, builder, worldMatrix, color, spawnFlags: flags, builtBy: author.IdentityId, completionCallback: delegate() { AfterGridBuild(builder, grid, instantBuild); });
4456 
4457 
4458 
4459  if (grid != null)
4460  {
4461  if(grid.IsStatic && grid.GridSizeEnum != MyCubeSize.Small)
4462  {
4463  bool result = MyCoordinateSystem.Static.IsLocalCoordSysExist(ref worldMatrix, grid.GridSize);
4464  if (result)
4465  {
4466  MyCoordinateSystem.Static.RegisterCubeGrid(grid);
4467  }
4468  else
4469  {
4470  MyCoordinateSystem.Static.CreateCoordSys(grid, CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.StaticGridAlignToCenter, true);
4471  }
4472  }
4473  }
4474  }
